, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banks are required to\ncreate a transaction report and alert the law whenever someone makes a deposit\nover ten thousand dollars in cash, but they are not required to report it if\nsomeone deposits nine thousand dollars in cash every day, for instance.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So then if there\u2019s a\nlot of money to launder, the first step is splitting it up into tinier piles of\nless than ten thousand dollars and funnelling it through the banking system as\ndiscreetly as possible, with the bank manager in cahoots .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From there, your money\nmoves in and out of tax shelters and other unregulated banking systems and\nthrough as many legitimate systems, too, cleaning the cash of any trace of its\norigin as you flip the money around the worldwide network of depositors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Political parties had\nthe clear option to print backdated receipts with connivance of Indian bank\nmanagers of foreign banks and launder HOARDED black money during the\ndemonetization period .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some bank managers got\na 20% cut in lieu of exchange of Rs 500 and Rs 1,000 notes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Nobody has the imprisoned. The govt is afraid\nof Rothschild\u2019s banks<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Old currency notes of\nRs 500 and Rs 1,000 were taken during the demonitisation period by jewellers,\nbut with back-dated bills. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The govt\nshould have foreseen this and asked all jewelers to mention in writing their\nLAST receipt number..&nbsp; For purchases\nworth under Rs 2 lakh, there is no need for PAN card. So, multiple receipts\nwith amounts less than Rs 2 lakh can easily be created.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jewellers could deposit\nthe money so collected in their bank accounts until December 30, 2016. Little\nwonder then that jewellers were seen charging anywhere around Rs 40,000 for 10\ngrams of gold, even as the market rate was Rs 30,500.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Real estate developers\nand building contractors paid in advance six months\u2019 salary to their labourers.\n&nbsp;Play ball or&nbsp; no job ! These contractors have goons in\ntheir payrorll. &nbsp;&nbsp;The workers were given\na 2% to 4% &nbsp;salary hike as an incentive.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nidea behind this move was that the employer would either deduct money monthly\u2014goons\nknew whose legs to break or whose children to kidnap.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One&nbsp; Mumbai shopkeeper has asked 25 of his\nemployees to deposit Rs 40 lakh in their bank accounts and return the money in\na couple of months. &nbsp;&nbsp;None of these e\nemployees paid income tax.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Big Fish businessmen\ntook the &nbsp;\u2018sarkari\u2019 route like they did\nwith various chit-fund accounts. By identifying a group of people with Jan Dhan\naccounts, &nbsp;businessmen divided his money\nin all the accounts and ensure that the amount deposited in each doesn\u2019t exceed\nRs 2 lakh. In return, the person in whose name the money is parked gets a\ncommission of Rs 20,000.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once injected into the banking system, the person\nwithdraws the money in instalments over a period of time and gives it back to\nthe owner against the commission.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Currency traders charged\n60 per cent to swap &nbsp;demonetised notes.&nbsp;&nbsp; The second-most-preferred way for getting\nmoney legitimised \u2013 next only to gold \u2013 was the dollar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 25% cut was\noffered to a bankers, for getting the notes exchanged in due course. The modus\noperandi: The businessman would deposit money with the banker and then take\nback 75% &nbsp;of the money after some time,\nwith the balance 25% remaining with the banker as a facilitation fee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When two firms set up a\ncross-border joint venture, for example, they may choose to incorporate it on\nneutral turf. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The daughters of\nAzerbaijan\u2019s president appear secretly to control gold mines.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A nephew of South\nAfrica\u2019s president, Jacob Zuma, has done nicely out of oil contracts in the\nDemocratic Republic of Congo, where South Africa has sent more than 1,000\npeacekeepers.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Former Ukrainian\npresident Viktor Yanukovych owned a presidential palace, a private zoo ( his\nversion or art ) , a vintage car collection and many other luxuries thanks in\npart to anonymous shell companies.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The banks or lawyers\nwire-transfer the funds in such a way that the money crosses multiple borders,\nto frustrate detection or confiscation.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For instance, the money might end up in a US trust managed by a shell\ncompany in Grand Cayman, owned by another trust in Guernsey with an account in\nLuxembourg managed by a Swiss or Singaporean or Caribbean banker who doesn't\nknow who the owner is.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money is laundered in\nPanama via bulk cash and trade by exploiting vulnerabilities at the airport,\nusing commercial cover and free trade zones (FTZs), and exploiting the lack of\nregulatory monitoring in many sectors of the economy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The protection of client\nsecrecy is often stronger than authorities\u2019 ability to pierce the corporate\nveil to pursue an investigation. Money can also be laundered in Panama by\nputting shell companies to work, the same way shell companies are used to\nlaunder money in other parts of the world.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assets may be secretly transferred\nto a shell company &amp;/or a shell company may be used to open a secret\noffshore bank account. In these situations, the shell companies may act as\nlaundering links which wash assets in a money laundering circuit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mossack Fonseca was in\nthe business of establishing shell companies. Businesses that establish shell\ncompanies are usually called \u201cnominee incorporation services.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mossack and Fonseca\nprovided nominee directors for the corporation, so your name is not actually\nregistered in the government\u2019s documents and therefore cannot be traced back to\nyou.&nbsp; The corporation is controlled with\nshares, which are registered by date at a notary and not accessible online like\nthe directors of a corporation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A divorcing spouse; judgment creditor;\nbankruptcy creditor; or a beneficiary under a trust or will; may face an\nadversary hiding assets through nominees (i.e. intermediaries).. An adversary\ncan hide real estate, automobiles, jewelry; and offshore bank accounts by\ntitling them in the names of nominees.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nominees are easily accessed through\nnominee incorporation services like the one at the \u201cAnonymous Panama\nCorporation\u201d webpage.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u201cAnonymous Panama Corporation\u201d webpage can be used to\nform a Panamanian shell company with \u201cnominee directors.\u201d The initial fee for\nthis service is $1200. The webpage suggests that one can \u201csave taxes or\nprotect\u2026assets\u201d by forming a Panamanian shell company: The Nominee Directors\nwill not have control over your corporation and can be replaced at any time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This type of\ncorporation is a good choice if your objective is to save taxes or protect your\nassets. The actual owner of this corporation is not registered in public\nrecords. Shell companies are not the only things that can be utilized as\nnominees. Lawyers; accountants; bankers; financial advisors; paramours; family\nmembers and trusts can be nominees.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The use of bearer\nshares, nominee shareholders, and nominee directors function to mask ownership\nin a corporate entity. They are used by money launderers to evade scrutiny.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;One controversial but legitimate function for\nshell companies is to serve as a holding company for intellectual property\nrights. When franchisees or licensees are billed for their use of intellectual\nproperty, such as a brand name or trademark, earnings are shifted to the&nbsp; location of the holding company which affects\nwhere earnings are recognized and taxes are paid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intermediaries, called\nnominee incorporation services (NIS), establish U.S. shell companies and bank accounts\non behalf of foreign clients. NIS may be located in the United States or\noff-shore. Corporate lawyers in the United States often use NIS to organize\ncompanies on behalf of their domestic and foreign clients because such services\ncan efficiently organize legal entities in any state.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NIS must comply with\napplicable state and federal procedures as well as any specific bank\nrequirements.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those laws and\nprocedures dictate what information NISmust share about the owners of a legal\nentity. Money launderers have also utilized NIS to hide their identities. By\nhiring a firm to serve as an intermediary between themselves and the licensing\njurisdiction and the bank, a company\u2019s beneficial owners may avoid disclosing\ntheir identities in state corporate filings and in the documentation used to\nopen corporate bank accounts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several mechanisms\noperate to provide corporate entities with additional anonymity. Bearer shares\nare negotiable instruments that accord ownership of a company to the person who\npossesses the share certificate. Such share certificates do not contain the\nname of the shareholder and are not registered, with the possible exception of\ntheir serial numbers. Accordingly, these shares provide for a high level of\nanonymity and are easily negotiable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nominee shareholders\ncan also be used in privately-held companies to shield beneficial ownership\ninformation. The allowance of nominee shareholders undermines the usefulness of\nthe shareholder register or the shareholder list because the shareholder of\nrecord may not be the ultimate beneficial owner. Similarly, nominee directors\nand companies serving as directors of a legal entity may conceal the identity\nof those persons controlling the company.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trusts separate legal\nownership from beneficial ownership and are useful when assets are given to\nminors or individuals who are incapacitated. The trust creator, or settlor,\ntransfers legal ownership of the assets to a trustee, which can be an\nindividual or a corporation. The trustee fiduciary manages the assets on behalf\nof the beneficiary based on the terms of the trust deed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trusts can also be\nmisused for illicit purposes. Trusts enjoy a greater degree of privacy and\nautonomy than other corporate vehicles, as virtually all jurisdictions\nrecognizing trusts do not require registration or central registries and there\nare few authorities charged with overseeing trusts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In most jurisdictions,\nno disclosure of the identity of the beneficiary or the settlor is made to\nauthorities. Accordingly, trusts can conceal the identity of the beneficial\nowner of assets and, as will be discussed below, can be abused for money\nlaundering purposes, particularly in the layering and integration stages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Legal entities such as\nshell companies and trusts are used globally, but because of their ability to\nhide ownership and mask financial details they have become popular tools for\nmoney launderers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United Nations&nbsp; that \u201cthe principal forms of abuse of secrecy\nhave shifted from individual bank accounts to corporate bank accounts and then\nto trust and other corporate forms that can be purchased readily without even\nthe modest initial and ongoing due diligence that is exercised in the banking\nsector.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The competition among\ncertain states to attract legal entities to their jurisdictions has created a\n\u201crace to the bottom,\u201d&nbsp; and a real money\nlaundering threat. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While they are often\nused for legitimate purposes, bearer shares, nominee shareholders, and trusts\nalso provide money launderers with the tools to hide their identity from\nfinancial institutions and law enforcement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As an example, a\nDelaware-registered company may be owned by a national of any jurisdiction,\nregardless of his or her place of residence. The company can be operated and\nmanaged&nbsp; worldwide, and is not required\nto report any assets. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regional criminal\norganizations were abusing Delaware shell companies for money laundering. The\nsecrecy inherent in Delaware\u2019s regime for legal entities has hindered\ninvestigations into suspicious financial activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But, Delaware is not\nthe most permissive jurisdiction in the United States with regard to company\nformation. Both Nevada and Wyoming permit companies to have bearer shares and\nnominee shareholders, which Delaware does not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The FBI has found that\ncertain NIS form corporate entities, open full-service bank accounts for those\nentities, and act as the registered agent to accept service of legal process on\nbehalf of those entities in a jurisdiction in which the entities have no\nphysical presence. An NIS can accomplish this without ever having to identify\nbeneficial ownership on company formation, registration, or<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">bank account\ndocuments.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">U.S. shell companies and bank\naccounts arranged by certain NIS firms are being used to launder as much as $36\nbillion a year from the former Soviet Union&nbsp;\nNIS firms are complicit in the money laundering abuse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several international\nNIS firms have formed partnerships or marketing alliances with U.S. banks to\noffer financial services such as Internet banking and wire transfer\ncapabilities to shell&nbsp; ompanies and\nnon-U.S. citizens. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">U.S. banks\nparticipating in these marketing alliances open accounts through intermediaries\nwithout requiring the actual account holder\u2019s physical presence, accepting by\nmail copies of passport photos, utility bills, and other identifying\ninformation&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suspicious Activity Reports\nfiled by New York banks indicate an increase in the volume of shell company\nwire transfer activity through high-risk correspondent bank accounts, both in\nterms of dollar amounts&nbsp; and the number\nof transactions. These reports indicate that money is passing through\ncorrespondent accounts &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">established for Eastern\nEuropean banks.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trusts often constitute\nthe final layer of anonymity for those seeking to conceal their identity.\nRecent changes in the trust laws of some jurisdictions have aided money\nlaunderers in their use of trusts to conceal identity and to perpetrate fraud.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In certain jurisdictions, such as the Cook Islands, Nevis, and Niue, the trust\nlaws no longer require the names of the settlor and the beneficiaries to be\nplaced in the trust deed, permit settlors to retain control over the trust, and\nallow trusts to be revocable and of unlimited duration.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition, the amended\ntrust laws typically permit the trust deed to include a \u201cflee clause,\u201d a\nprovision triggered by the occurrence of certain events that directs the assets\nof the trust to be moved to another jurisdiction and new trustees to be\nappointed.</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A front organization is\nany entity set up by and controlled by another organization, such as\nintelligence agencies, organized crime groups, banned organizations, religious\nor political groups, advocacy groups, or corporations. Front organizations can\nact for the parent group without the actions being attributed to the parent\ngroup thereby allowing them to hide from public view.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Front\norganizations that appear to be independent voluntary associations or\ncharitable organizations are called front groups. In the business world, front\norganizations such as front companies or shell corporations are used to shield\nthe parent company from legal liability..</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intelligence agencies\nuse front organizations to provide \"cover\", plausible occupations and\nmeans of income, for their covert agents. These may include legitimate\norganizations, such as charity, religious or journalism organizations; or\n\"brass plate firms\" which exist solely to provide a plausible\nbackground story, occupation, and means of income.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nairline Air America, an outgrowth of Civil Air Transport of the 1940s, and\nSouthern Air Transport, ostensibly a civilian air charter company, were\noperated and wholly owned by the CIA, supposedly to provide humanitarian aid,\nbut flew many combat support missions and supplied covert operations in\nSoutheast Asia during the Vietnam War.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/pol-pot-of-khmer-rouge-great-cambodian.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/pol-pot-of-khmer-rouge-great-cambodian.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other CIA-funded front\ngroups have been used to spread American propaganda and influence during the\nCold War, particularly in the Third World.&nbsp;\nUS President Obama\u2019s mother Jewess Ann Dunham and grandmother Jewess Madelyn\nDunham were part of this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many organized crime\noperations have substantial legitimate businesses, such as licensed gambling\nhouses, building construction companies, restaurants and bars, billiard clubs,\ntrash hauling services, or dock loading enterprises. These front companies\nenable these criminal organizations to launder their income from illegal\nactivities.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;As well, the front companies provide plausible cover for illegal\nactivities such as drug trafficking, smuggling, and prostitution. Tattoo\nparlors are often used as fronts for outlaw motorcycle clubs..</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Colombian\ndrug cartel, the Cali Cartel, in the past used Drogas La Rebaja, now a large\nnational pharmacy store chain, as a front company in order to launder their\ndrug trafficking earnings.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Communist parties (especially Marxist-Leninist\nones) have sometimes used front organizations to attract support from those\n(sometimes called \"fellow travellers\") who do not fully agree with\nthe party's ideology, but agree with certain aspects of it. The front\norganization often obscures its provenance and may often be a tool for\nrecruitment.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other Marxists often describe front organizations as opportunist.\nThe concept of a front organization should be distinguished from the united\nfront (a coalition of working class or socialist parties) and the popular\nfront. Both the united front and popular front usually disclose the groups that\nmake up their coalitions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/bauxite-mining-naxalite-menace-joshua.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/bauxite-mining-naxalite-menace-joshua.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the most common\nmethods of misappropriating cash from an organization involves disguising a\nfraudulent disbursement as a legitimate one. A shell company is the perfect\nvehicle for this purpose. The perpetrator \u2014 typically an employee with\nbudget/purchasing authority or someone who oversees and approves the invoices\nof vendors \u2014 simply inserts invoices on behalf of the shell company into the payment\nsystem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell companies \u2014 and\nthe alleged services they offer \u2014 do not necessarily enter a company\u2019s accounts\npayable system randomly. These entities might hijack the identity of a real\nvendor in the system by changing an address or payment information.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With this\ntechnique, the ideal target is a formerly valid vendor that no longer provides\nservices to the organization, but is still on the company\u2019s list of approved\nvendors or in the accounts payable master file. Another common method is the\ncreation of a fictitious vendor with a name that is very close to an existing,\nvalid vendor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this scheme, the\nperpetrator arranges for a legitimate vendor to provide goods or services, but\ndirects the vendor to invoice the perpetrator\u2019s shell company. The shell company\nthen invoices the victim organization at an inflated amount, enabling the\nperpetrator to profit from the markup. Because the expected goods or services\nare actually delivered and received, detecting these schemes is more difficult.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many organizations have\npolicies requiring competitive bidding or a minimum number of bids for\nprocurements that exceed a specified threshold. To sidestep these policies and\nfeign a legitimate procurement process, the perpetrator includes phantom bids\nfrom shell companies in the procurement files.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shell companies submit\nproposals that either offer inflated prices to make the already inflated price\nof the corrupt vendor look appealing, or they include provisions that\ndisqualify their bids. Either way, the vendor awarded the contract appears to\nwin the bid through a legitimate process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The perpetrator\nmanipulates the purchase price by splitting the project into multiple, smaller\ncontracts that fall below the monetary threshold that triggers a company\u2019s\nrequirement that a contract be competitively bid.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, if competitive\nbidding starts at a $100,000 threshold, the procurement officer awards what\nshould have been a $450,000 contract as five separate $90,000 contracts. To\nhide the fact that the same vendor won all five contracts, the perpetrator may\nestablish shell companies on behalf of the vendor so it appears the company\nmade a series of related or similar purchases from different vendors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Multiple crooked\nvendors can circumvent an organization\u2019s competitive bidding process if all of\nthe bidders are in on the ruse. This is common when there is a limited pool of\nvendors, through bid rotation, complementary bidding and other schemes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If all vendors\nare in agreement, but only one will win the contract, how do the \u201closers\u201d\nbenefit from their participation? In some cases, vendors who agree to \u201close\u201d\nshow up as subcontractors or suppliers to the winner. But using the real names\nof the losers looks suspicious. So, they establish shell companies through\nwhich subcontract work or supplies are filtered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much like the\npass-through disbursement scheme, vendors can inflate their billings through\nthe use of shell companies in cost-based or time-and-materials billing\nsituations, such as construction contracts, product development and many\nothers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here, the shell company is used to inflate the real cost of materials\npurchased from legitimate suppliers (or to inflate the real cost of labor\nbilled by legitimate subcontractors). Shells might even be used to pad an\ninvoice for purported materials or subcontract labor that was never provided.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many Foreign Corrupt\nPractices Act investigations have revealed the existence of shell companies\nused to facilitate the payment of bribes to foreign officials. In this\nscenario, a shell company is established, perhaps posing as a vendor or\ncharity. The company transfers funds to the shell, supported by apparently\nlegitimate documentation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shell now serves as the pool of funds which the\ncompany makes illegal payments to government officials. On the other end of the\ntransaction, a shell company might be established to receive the bribes and\nhide the real beneficiary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Panamanian law firm\nat the center of a global investigation advised some clients that they could\ncloak their money in foundations that named as beneficiaries prominent\ninternational charities such as the Red Cross, UNICEF and the World Wildlife\nFund.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\u2019s no sign that\nany money from those offshore dealings went to the charities, whose\nspokespeople say they had no clue they were part of Mossack Fonseca\u2019s marketing\nstrategy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bill and Hillary\nClinton, along with their CHARITABLE nonprofit Clinton Foundation, have\nestablished at least five shell companies in Delaware..</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All\nfive are filed at 1209 North Orange Street in Wilmington.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The address is shared\nwith companies like Google, Apple, Bank of America, Coca-Cola, Ford, General Electric\nand more than 280,000 others that use the facility to take advantage of the\nstate's tax laws.</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Couple\nof months before the atom bombs fell on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, Japanese\noccupiers of Hapcheon province of Korea created a DELIBERATE &nbsp;famine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Survival\nwas at stake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; The\nJapanese at the periphery suffered more .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; &nbsp;These were from all over Korea.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AMERICA\nNEEDS TO APOLOGIZE TO KOREA --NOT JAPAN -- &nbsp;AS THESE TWO ATOM BOMBS HAD HIGHEST NOTCH\nSECRET JAPANESE SANCTION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1932, Japanese owned 64% of cultivable land in Korea. &nbsp; Japs were absentee\nowners. &nbsp; &nbsp;Koreans were working as slaves in their own country .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Korean\ntenants were forced to pay 70% of their crop as rent-- failing which their\nunderage daughters were forcibly taken away to work in Japanese factories of\nHiroshima and Nagasaki-- the naked truth is they were converted to prostitutes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; and, specifically weapons that employ nuclear energy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">The joint agreement\nwas between the United Kingdom and the United States, and signed by JEW Winston\nChurchill and JEW Franklin Delano Roosevelt on August 19, 1943, two years\nbefore the end of World War II, in Quebec City, Quebec, Canada.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">American President Harry S. Truman called for Japan's surrender, warning it\nto \"expect a rain of ruin from the air, the like of which has never been\nseen on this earth.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Three\ndays later, on August 9, a plutonium implosion-type (Fat Man) bomb was dropped\non Nagasaki.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Within the first 10 days of the bombings, the acute effects of\nthe atomic bombings killed &nbsp;more than 148000 people in Hiroshima and 75000 in Nagasaki ;\nroughly 65% of the deaths in each city occurred in the first 3 hours.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">During\nthe following months, large numbers died from the effect of burns, radiation\nsickness, and other injuries, compounded by illness and malnutrition.
