, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">57 seconds later, at the predetermined\naltitude of 600 meters, the bomb detonated directly over Shima Surgical Clinic.\nThe resulting blast was measured at 13 kilotons of TNT, reducing an area of one\nmile in radius to total ruin. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--ZaORqSikkc/WLvf5TPorzI/AAAAAAABRdQ/brmCus91jtsEbM_lorbB2pLfkpXFY8QnQCLcB/s1600/HiroGGshima.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"452\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--ZaORqSikkc/WLvf5TPorzI/AAAAAAABRdQ/brmCus91jtsEbM_lorbB2pLfkpXFY8QnQCLcB/s640/HiroGGshima.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fires were\nstarted across an area 12 square-kilometers in size. Koreans killed instantly hadno\nidea what had happened.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 560 grams of Uranium 235 took about 10 nanoseconds\nof fission before a flash of light burst out of the bomb casing, releasing the\nfirst wave of gamma rays that traveled nearly at the speed of light. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1/10,000 of a second, a second burst of\ngamma rays was released. &nbsp;In 3\nmilliseconds, a plasma fireball began to form. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 91 milliseconds, the bottom of the plasma\nfireball began to reach the top of the tallest buildings beneath the\ndetonation. &nbsp;Soon after, a shock wave\nwhich traveled at twice the speed of sound came. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AcPMO4qBpEs/WLvBdG6vBNI/AAAAAAABRcs/vamWs-xN-gkxVBdMs6MzFsbHciiIPlzzQCLcB/s1600/584x270_hirFoshima5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"294\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AcPMO4qBpEs/WLvBdG6vBNI/AAAAAAABRcs/vamWs-xN-gkxVBdMs6MzFsbHciiIPlzzQCLcB/s640/584x270_hirFoshima5.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">ONE MILLISECOND IS 1 &nbsp;/1000 OF A SECOND&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human nervous system required 1/30 of a\nsecond to register, and 1/10 of a second to flinch, thus for those who were\nclose to the detonation, the blood in the victims' brains were likely\nevaporating before they could feel anything.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Koreans were lucky. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gHmZFZzfDOY/WLvBQw06A3I/AAAAAAABRck/ryJUioy9bh0nJ4lsOVxjE1odYEQPdDqLACLcB/s1600/220px-Ssumiteru_Taniguchi_back.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"232\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gHmZFZzfDOY/WLvBQw06A3I/AAAAAAABRck/ryJUioy9bh0nJ4lsOVxjE1odYEQPdDqLACLcB/s400/220px-Ssumiteru_Taniguchi_back.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Japanese who had shifted to the periphery of\nthe&nbsp; epicentre did NOT know the power of\nthe bombs-they would die most painful deaths&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>THIS BOMBING WOULD HAVE\nNEVER TAKEN PLACE IF THE POPULATION WERE WHITE &nbsp;SKINS \u2013 &nbsp; &nbsp; WE ARE NOT TALKING ABOUT ENGLISH\nSPEAKING WHITE SKINS OR JEWISH WHITE SKINS <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Six miles below the\ncrew of the Enola Gay, the people of Hiroshima were waking up and preparing for\ntheir daily routines.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was 8:16 A.M. on 6th\nAug 1945.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The B-29 plane that\ncarried Little Boy from Tinian Island in the western Pacific to Hiroshima was\nknown as the Enola Gay, after pilot Paul Tibbets' mother.&nbsp;&nbsp; Along with Tibbets, copilot Robert Lewis,\nbombardier Tom Ferebee, navigator Theodore Van Kirk, and tail gunner Robert\nCaron were among the others on board the Enola Gay. Below are their eyewitness\naccounts of the first atomic bomb dropped on Japan.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SbwGUXSJLa0/WLvfwETYPZI/AAAAAAABRdM/JZR1gYtQxkQBXFa2-fOGeR7moZgXFvhNwCLcB/s1600/FATMAN%2B150717145802-16-hiroshima-70th-anniversary-photos-restricted-super-169.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SbwGUXSJLa0/WLvfwETYPZI/AAAAAAABRdM/JZR1gYtQxkQBXFa2-fOGeR7moZgXFvhNwCLcB/s640/FATMAN%2B150717145802-16-hiroshima-70th-anniversary-photos-restricted-super-169.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pilot Paul Tibbets:\n\"We turned back to look at Hiroshima. The city was hidden by that awful\ncloud... boiling up, mushrooming, terrible and incredibly tall. No one spoke\nfor a moment; then everyone was talking. I remember (copilot Robert) Lewis\npounding my shoulder, saying 'Look at that! Look at that! Look at that!'\n(Bombardier) Tom Ferebee wondered about whether radioactivity would make us all\nsterile. Lewis said he could taste atomic fission. He said it tasted like\nlead.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Navigator Theodore Van\nKirk recalls the shockwaves from the explosion: \"(It was) very much as if\nyou've ever sat on an ash can and had somebody hit it with a baseball bat...\nThe plane bounced, it jumped and there was a noise like a piece of sheet metal\nsnapping.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those of us who had flown quite a bit over Europe thought that it was\nanti-aircraft fire that had exploded very close to the plane.\" On viewing\nthe atomic fireball: \"I don't believe anyone ever expected to look at a\nsight quite like that. Where we had seen a clear city two minutes before, we\ncould now no longer see the city. We could see smoke and fires creeping up the\nsides of the mountains.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jl3GNxilMEY/WLvfpR7IZ7I/AAAAAAABRdI/GFyZ5jhav3wMtfXDySu3mpttOMO65NeIwCLcB/s1600/imddages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"420\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jl3GNxilMEY/WLvfpR7IZ7I/AAAAAAABRdI/GFyZ5jhav3wMtfXDySu3mpttOMO65NeIwCLcB/s640/imddages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tail gunner Robert\nCaron: \"The mushroom itself was a spectacular sight, a bubbling mass of\npurple-gray smoke and you could see it had a red core in it and everything was\nburning inside. As we got farther away, we could see the base of the mushroom\nand below we could see what looked like a few-hundred-foot layer of debris and\nsmoke and what have you... I saw fires springing up in different places, like\nflames shooting up on a bed of coals.\"</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 65 minutes\nbefore the American bombers reached Hiroshima, they were detected by Japanese\nradar.&nbsp; Air raid warnings were sounded in\nseveral cities, including Hiroshima,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the bomb burst\nmany people who were burned so quickly and so severely that, as survivors told,\nthey resembled living pieces of charcoal, wandering mindlessly unless they\ncollapsed and died. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-teJ5T2jkCJE/WLvfQY55bOI/AAAAAAABRc8/LhtlTXpgs4sXCw6OPzE_vqf7Wo4nk2ZcQCLcB/s1600/393-tddibbets-enola-gay.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"502\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-teJ5T2jkCJE/WLvfQY55bOI/AAAAAAABRc8/LhtlTXpgs4sXCw6OPzE_vqf7Wo4nk2ZcQCLcB/s640/393-tddibbets-enola-gay.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">On 9th Aug 1945 at 0750\nhours the presence of American bombers caused the city of Nagasaki to sound the\nair raid alarms,&nbsp; but the \"all\nclear\" signal was strangely given at 0830 hrs despite 20/ 20 hindsight of\nHiroshima.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At 1101 hours, Beahan\nreleased the bomb over Urakami.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 43\nseconds later, the \"Fat Man\" bomb containing about 6.4 kilograms of\nPlutonium 239 detonated at the altitude of 469 meters over the halfway point\nbetween the Mitsubishi Steel and Arms Works in the south and the\nMitsubishi-Urakami Ordnance Works (a factory producing torpedoes) in the north.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PMRGus00x_4/WLvfWoy-izI/AAAAAAABRdA/_4sqMRhTfn8sFjBYNyhP96ozss5b2q_lgCLcB/s1600/150727155314-01-atomic-boVVmbing-anniversary-0727-restricted-super-169.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PMRGus00x_4/WLvfWoy-izI/AAAAAAABRdA/_4sqMRhTfn8sFjBYNyhP96ozss5b2q_lgCLcB/s640/150727155314-01-atomic-boVVmbing-anniversary-0727-restricted-super-169.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ground Zero was about 3 kilometers northwest of the original aiming point near\nthe center of Nagasaki. The resulting blast was much greater than the\n\"Little Boy\" blast that devastated Hiroshima three days earlier.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Below:</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;100% of what made THIEF German Jew &nbsp;Albert Einstein famous was stolen from Indian Vedas.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Energy and matter is\nconvertible E= MC2 ( formula used to end the 2nd world war with Nuclear bomb\n--localised in Hiroshima and Nagasaki )...</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\">( it goes further to\n</span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>E=T MC2</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"> as in Vedic BRAHMASTRA, for faster than light Tesla Scalar\nInterferometry-- formula to start and end World War 3 -- AND TOTAL ANNIHILATION\n). Where </span><b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">T is 'delta T ' or change of time</span></b><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">.</span> When scalar beams hurtle through\nhyperspace the flow of time gets redirected temporarily.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0cX6bRfvWFk/WLwRC5l3RAI/AAAAAAABRds/fGKhLCIAbJsUF5jeGl4JgP-GkG4RS3rGQCLcB/s1600/dowSSSnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0cX6bRfvWFk/WLwRC5l3RAI/AAAAAAABRds/fGKhLCIAbJsUF5jeGl4JgP-GkG4RS3rGQCLcB/s640/dowSSSnload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/lb13ynu3Iac/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/lb13ynu3Iac?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">OPPENHEIMER ACTED AS IF\nHE KNEW BEFORE HAND THE MIGHTY POWER WITHIN THE ATOM AND THIS AMAZED ALL.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oppenheimer became officially involved in\nthe atomic bomb project in Oct. 1941. This would come to be known as the\nManhattan Engineer District Project. In Nov. 1942 he was appointed Director of\nwhat was to become the Los Alamos Laboratory, which would design and construct\nthe atomic bomb. People marveled at how he seemed to understand any concept\ninstantly.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">All considered Oppenheimer to be their intellectual superior-- Nikola Tesla was dead two years before .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oppenheimer\nheaded the Scientific Panel which advised the Interim Committee to use the\natomic bomb on Japan. As the wartime head of the Los Alamos Laboratory, Oppenheimer\nis &nbsp;called the \"father of the atomic\nbomb\". &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">He cried after the first bomb\nexploded.</span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Starfish Prime, the most powerful and highest space nuclear test ever conducted, produced a flash of light visible over much of the Pacific.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Starfish Prime was intended to test whether nuclear explosions in low-Earth orbit (LEO) could augment and expand the Earth-girdling Van Allen radiation belts to create a barrier that would incapacitate Soviet intercontinental missiles launched against the United States.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For seven minutes after the explosion, an artificial red aurora danced in the skies over island groups as widely separated as Hawaii, Tonga, and Samoa (image at top of post). The blast\u2019s electromagnetic pulse damaged electrical systems on Oahu, 800 miles away from the explosion.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When the nuclear bombs were detonated the huge amount of light released activated the massive release of chlorine which gobbled up a gigantic hole in the ozone.</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; NUCLEAR INSPECTORS SEND BY WHITE JEWS WILL PAINT NORTH KOREAN TARGETS -SO THAT THEY CAN TAKE IT OUT WITH GPS PRECISION<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON A KIM LOSES HIS NUCLEAR INSURANCE POLICY--HE IS AT THE MERCY OF TRUMP WHO APPEARS NOW TO BE TOTALLY CONTROLLED BY THE DEEP STATE FORCES AND MOSSAD..<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS ISRAEL HAVING NUCLEAR BOMB? BECAUSE THE US DEEP STATE GAVE THEM THE WHEREWITHAL.<br />\n<br />\nUS PRESIDENT JFK WAS ASSASSINATED BY THE US DEEP STATE -- BECAUSE HE CRACKED DOWN ON THE ISRAELI LOBBY WITHIN THE DEEP STATE.. HE WANTED ISRAELI DIMONA NUCLEAR FACILITY TO BE INSPECTED..<br />\n<br />\nConstruction of the SECRET Israeli nuclear facility began in 1958 and its heavy-water nuclear reactor went active sometime in 1963.<br />\n<br />\nIsrael maintains a policy known as nuclear ambiguity\u2014refusing either to confirm or deny their possession of nuclear missiles.<br />\n<br />\nIsrael had produced its first nuclear weapons by 1967 and it has been estimated to possess more than 420 nuclear weapons<br />\n<br />\nConstruction commenced in 1958, with French Rothschild assistance-- Protocol of S\u00e8vres agreements<br />\n<br />\nThe complex was constructed in secret, and outside the International Atomic Energy Agency inspection regime<br />\n<br />\nTo maintain secrecy, French customs officials were told that the largest of the reactor components, such as the reactor tank, were part of a desalination plant bound for Latin America<br />\n<br />\nWhen the United States intelligence community discovered the purpose of the site in the early 1960s, the U.S. government demanded that Israel agree to international inspections.<br />\n<br />\nIsrael agreed, but on the condition that U.S ( READ AS DEEP STATE ) ., rather than International Atomic Energy Agency, inspectors be used, and that Israel would receive advance notice of all inspections..<br />\n<br />\nThe inspectors eventually informed the U.S. government that their inspections were useless, due to Israeli restrictions on what areas of the facility they could inspect.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1986, Mordechai Vanunu, a former technician at Dimona, fled to the United Kingdom and revealed to the media some evidence of Israel's nuclear program and explained the purposes of each building, also revealing a top-secret underground facility directly below the installation.<br />\n<br />\nThe Mossad, Israel's secret service, sent a female agent named Cheryl Bentov (Hanin) who lured Vanunu to Italy, where he was kidnapped by Mossad agents and smuggled to Israel aboard a freighter.<br />\n<br />\nAn Israeli court then tried him in secret on charges of treason and espionage, and sentenced him to eighteen years imprisonment<br />\n<br />\nThe Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi claimed during a United Nations General Assembly speech in 2009 that Israel had ordered the killing of President John F. Kennedy because Kennedy had wanted to investigate the Negev Nuclear Plant.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_162B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/ethnic-cleansing-of-blackskinned-people.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_162B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_162MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nBut how can we expect Iran to curb its nuclear ambitions if the Israelis won't come clean?<br />\n<br />\nIRAN HAS THE WHEREWITHAL TO CONVERT USA TO STONE AGE AND KILL 90% OF US CITIZENS WITH JUST EMP MISSILES.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_163B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2258016616088898285\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_163M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. />\n<br />\n<br />\nIn 2009, when a veteran Washington reporter, Helen Thomas, asked JEW Barack Obama in the first month of his presidency if he knew of any country in the Middle East with nuclear weapons, he dodged the trapdoor by saying only that he did not wish to \"speculate\"<br />\n<br />\nModi must know this -- since he loves to hug JEW Presidents of France.<br />\n<br />\nFrance took the toughest line on counter-proliferation when it came to Iran helped lay the foundations of Israel's nuclear weapons programme<br />\n<br />\nIn Dimona, French engineers poured in to help build Israel a nuclear reactor and a far more secret reprocessing plant capable of separating plutonium from spent reactor fuel<br />\n<br />\nBy the end of the 50s, there were 2,500 French citizens living in Dimona, transforming it from a village to a cosmopolitan town, complete with French lyc\u00e9es and streets full of Renaults, and yet the whole endeavour was conducted under a thick veil of secrecy.<br />\n<br />\nThe American investigative journalist Seymour Hersh wrote in his book The Samson Option: \"French workers at Dimona were forbidden to write directly to relatives and friends in France and elsewhere, but sent mail to a phony post-office box in Latin America<br />\n<br />\nIsrael refused to countenance visits by the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), so in the early 1960s President Kennedy demanded they accept American inspectors.<br />\n<br />\nThe lead American inspector, Floyd Culler, an expert on plutonium extraction, noted in his reports that there were newly plastered and painted walls in one of the buildings.<br />\n<br />\nIt turned out that before each American visit, the Israelis had built false walls around the row of lifts that descended six levels to the subterranean reprocessing plant<br />\n<br />\nIF THE WHITE SKINNED ISRAELIS ( OF KHAZARI GEORGIA ORIGINS ) CAN CLAIM PALESTINE-- THEN BLACK NIGERAIANS CAN CLAIM SAIDI OIL FIELDS AND MECCA AS THEY ARE ALSO MUSLIMS.. IT DOES NOT MATTER OF THEY DONT LOOK LIKE THEIR NEIGHBORS AROUND THEM.<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID GEORGIA HAVE JEWS?<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE THE KING OF CALICUT OWNED DHOFAR KINGDDOM\u2014SOUTH PART OF OMAN , NORTH PART OF YEMEN.. ONE OF HIS DHOFAR PORTS WAS GWADAR WHERE THERE WAS A DEVI FIRE TEMPLE WITH ETERNAL FLAME.<br />\nCALICUT KINGS SHIPS UNLOADED SPICES AT GWADAR ( PAKISTAN ) AND SALALAH ( OMAN ) AND FROM THEY IT WENT BY OVERLAND ROUTE TO HAIFA ( ISRAEL ) AND BATUMI ( GEORGIA ).. FROM HERE SPICES WERE LOADED ON SHIPS AND TAKEN TO EUROPE..<br />\n<br />\nJEWS WERE MIDDLEMEN FOR SPICES AT GEORGIA AND PALESTINE .<br />\n<br />\nTHE JEWS AT GEORGIA AND PALESTINE WERE CIRCUMCISED AS THEY WERE MOSTLY HOMOSEXUALS\u2014WHO DID NOT WANT SHIT UNDER THE FORESKIN OF THEIR PRICKS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE GEORGIAN JEWS ( KHAZARIA ) WERE SO MEAN WITH CORRUPTED DNA.. , serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WELL, AESOP FABLES IS 100% LIFTED FROM \"PANCHATANTRA TALES \" OF INDIA..</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; IN OVER 8 DECADES OF LECTURES IN ROME, AND THESE STORIES WERE KNOWN TO INDIANS THREE MILLINIUMS BEFORE ......</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PLATO STOLE THESE STORIES ( TAUGHT AT KODUNGALLUR UNIVERISTY ) PHILOSOPHY CLASSES AND WENT BACK TO GREECE AND NARRATED THEM AS IF HE INVENTED THESE STORIES.. HE NEATLY REPLACED ANIMALS AND BIRDS ( TIGER/ PEACOCK ETC ) WITH WESTERN ANIMALS AND BIRDS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GETTING BACK..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE NORTH WIND AND THE SUN IS A PANCHATANTRA STORY, WRITTEN 5000 YEARS AGO...THIS IS THE BASIS OF THE \"SUNSHINE POLICY\"..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">QUOTE: The North Wind and the Sun were disputing which was the stronger, when a traveler came along wrapped in a warm cloak. They agreed that the one who first succeeded in making the traveler take his cloak off should be considered stronger than the other. Then the North Wind blew as hard as he could, but the more he blew the more closely did the traveler fold his cloak around him; and at last the North Wind gave up the attempt. Then the Sun shined out warmly, and immediately the traveler took off his cloak. And so the North Wind was obliged to confess that the Sun was the stronger of the two.:UNQUOTE&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Sunshine Policy is the policy of South Korea towards North Korea during Kim Dae-jung\u2019s presidency. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The formal name of the policy was the \"Comprehensive Engagement Policy towards North Korea\" and first announced by the 15th South Korean President, Kim Dae-jung, in 1998 with white JEW help. He would be given Nobel Prize for this in 2000 AD\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">By the way KIMs have Indian DNA and are ruler class of Korea.</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/korean-brahmins-kim-hae-clan-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">NORTH KOREA IS RICHER THAN SAUDI ARABIA..</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/regime-change-in-north-korea-rare.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The term \"Sunshine Policy\" was originated from one of Aesop's fables, \"The North Wind and the Sun,\" as the policy aimed for loosening containment on North Korea, embracing North Korea, and eventually making the North Korean government to denuclearize by itself.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Sunshine Policy refers to the theoretical basis for South Korea's foreign policy towards North Korea\u2026. the idea built on the traditional Korean ways of dealing with enemies by giving them gifts to prevent them from causing harm.. Facing bankruptcy and spending excessive portion of its funds on warfare along with the nuclear program, North Korea faced widespread starvation among its people during the time..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">These principles were meant to convey the message that the South does not wish to absorb the North or to undermine its government; its goal was peaceful co-existence rather than regime change</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Sunshine policy was based on three following principles: ----</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">## No armed provocation by the North will be tolerated.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">## The South will not attempt to absorb the North in any way. ( THE WHITE JEW WANTS THE RARE EARTHS OF NORTH KOREA )</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">## The South actively seeks cooperation.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THEY WANTED NORTH TO COME DOWN ON ITS KNEES AND THEN BE ABSORBED BY SOUTH KOREA. ..<br />\n<br />\nBy addressing the second principle, the South Korea halted forming tension with North Korea and appeased North Korea to reduce its spending in defense..<br />\n<br />\nBesides its direct influence on inter-Korean relations, the Sunshine Policy tremendously helped South Korean economy. It had been historically shown that more than billions of dollar evaporate in just one day whenever North Korea announced some antagonistic policy toward the South or caused military provocation on the South, because foreign investors then regarded the South Korean market as unstable<br />\n<br />\nThe third bullet point explicitly implied that the South would put unprecedented amount of effort and investment into the North if North Korea becomes cooperative. As a result, Kaesong Industrial Region (or KIR), a special administrative industrial region of North Korea, where 53,000 North Koreans and 800 South Koreans are employed and work together, was constructed. .<br />\n<br />\nThere was a substantial economic benefit to South Korea too. At the beginning of Kim Dea-jung's administration, South Korea was just bailed out from the IMF, so the South had to avoid confrontationist policy toward the North. In this sense, this coexistence, reconciliation policy helped South Korea from recovering its economic from the nadir.<br />\n<br />\nThe US DEEP STATE used the Sunshine Policy as a political gain in domestic politics in the South.<br />\n<br />\nBecause of the post-1998 'Sunshine policy', many South Korean nongovernmental organizations and the public weren't concerned about North Korea's threats, believing that Pyongyang would never use nuclear weapons against them..<br />\n<br />\nWITH KIM OF NORTH KOAREA HAVING ICBM MISSILES WHICH CAN DESTROY US CITIES \u201cSUNSHINE POLICCY\u201d IS FLUSED DOWN THE DRAIN..<br />\n<br />\nNORTH KOREANS HAVE SUFFERED ENOUGH.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/japanese-in-hiroshima-and-nagasaki.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES ( LEAVE OUT MOOTO AND KACHRAWAAL )<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nCJI<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\n<br />\nALL DESH BHAKT LEADERS OF INDIA<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_96b+seedDnIFD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_96b+seedDnIFD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">North Korea's human rights record has been considered the worst in the world and has been globally condemned, with KOSHER DEEP STATE groups such as the United Nations, Amnesty International, Human Rights Watch, and the European Union all critical of the country's record. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The General Assembly of the United Nations has since 2003 annually adopted a resolution condemning the country's human rights record. The latest resolution of December 19, 2011, passed by a vote of 123\u201316 with 51 abstentions, urged the government in Pyongyang to end its \"systematic, widespread and grave violations of human rights\", which included public executions and arbitrary detentions.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">North Korea rejected the resolution, saying it was politically motivated and based upon untrue fabrications-- and Capt Ajit Vadakayil agrees with North Korea.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">PEOPLE WHO KNOW ME WILL VOUCH --THAT CAPT AJIT VADAKAYILs OPINION HAS MORE WEIGHT THAN THE ENTIRE MAIN STREAM MEDIA OF THIS PLANET...
