, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reappearing beneficiary\nbanks based in offshore locations, the account of at least one of which has\nbeen closed by the reporting financial institution due to overall suspect\nactivity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Increased SAR Reporting\nInvolving Mexico<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Below: JNU commie Kanhaiya Kumar will call it <b><span style=\"color: red;\">INTEGRASSANN</span></b></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-W2c3UGJCAJ0/WLccPMDAJ6I/AAAAAAABRT4/kxZANgqlphMK6kVjUheiF8_40sGaH_hhQCLcB/s1600/MoneyLaunxxderingProcess.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"142\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-W2c3UGJCAJ0/WLccPMDAJ6I/AAAAAAABRT4/kxZANgqlphMK6kVjUheiF8_40sGaH_hhQCLcB/s640/MoneyLaunxxderingProcess.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In financial\nregulation, a Suspicious Activity Report (or SAR) is a report made by a\nfinancial institution about suspicious or potentially suspicious activity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\ncriteria to decide when a report must be made varies from country to country\nbut generally is any financial transaction that does not make sense to the\nfinancial institution, is unusual for that particular client or appears to be\ndone only for the purpose of hiding or obfuscating a transaction.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uIYGdpGiynk/WLcb8SRf1aI/AAAAAAABRT0/5-IoS_30Q9gGHy8DiXi9RojhW_UgKQLmQCLcB/s1600/chapter-6ee-suspicious-transaction-reporting-15-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"452\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uIYGdpGiynk/WLcb8SRf1aI/AAAAAAABRT0/5-IoS_30Q9gGHy8DiXi9RojhW_UgKQLmQCLcB/s640/chapter-6ee-suspicious-transaction-reporting-15-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The report is\nfiled with that country's financial crime enforcement unit, which is typically\na specialist agency designed to collect and analyse transactions and report\nthese to relevant law enforcement units.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Front line staff in the financial\ninstitution have the responsibility to identify transactions that may be\nsuspicious and these are reported to a designated person that is responsible\nfor the reporting the transaction. The financial institution is not allowed to\ninform the client or the parties to the transaction that a SAR has been lodged.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-S6-3XyWK1rk/WLcbopmeSrI/AAAAAAABRTw/eKQv8mPaBNc4s8C4spLqF3vVK_5Xs_Q5ACLcB/s1600/sar-cheeart-1.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-S6-3XyWK1rk/WLcbopmeSrI/AAAAAAABRTw/eKQv8mPaBNc4s8C4spLqF3vVK_5Xs_Q5ACLcB/s640/sar-cheeart-1.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many different types of\nfinance-related industries are required to file SARs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These include:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">depository institutions\n(for example, banks and credit unions)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">securities and futures\ndealers (for example, stock brokers and mutual fund brokers)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">money services\nbusinesses (for example, check cashing services, currency exchange bureaus, and\nmoney order providers)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">casinos and card clubs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">dealers in precious\nmetals and gems (for example, jewelery dealers)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">insurance companies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">mortgage companies and\nbrokers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/bWcobyThkl0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/bWcobyThkl0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Black Market Peso\nExchange System (BMPE) is a trade-based system that depends on commercial\ntraffic between the U.S. and Colombia to launder profits from the sale of\nillegal drugs in the United States.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The BMPE is a significant money laundering\nconduit used by Colombian narcotics traffickers in repatriating revenues to\nColombia. The process begins when a Colombian drug organization arranges the\nshipment of drugs to the United States.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The drugs are sold in the U.S. in\nexchange for U.S. currency that is then sold to a Colombian black market peso\nbroker's agent in the United States. The U.S. currency is sold at a discount\nbecause the broker and his agent must assume the risk of evading the Bank\nSecrecy Act reporting requirements when later placing the dollars into the U.S.\nfinancial system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the dollars are\ndelivered to the U.S.-based agent of the peso broker, the peso broker in\nColombia deposits the agreed upon equivalent in Colombian pesos into the\norganization's account in Colombia.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At this point, the organization has\nlaundered its money because it has successfully converted its drug dollars into\npesos, and the Colombian broker and his agent now assume the risk for\nintroducing the laundered drug dollars into the U.S. banking system, usually\nthrough a variety of surreptitious transactions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having introduced the dollars\ninto the U.S. banking system, the Colombian black market peso broker now has a\npool of laundered dollars to sell to Colombian importers. These importers then\nuse the dollars to purchase goods, either from the U.S. or from other markets,\nwhich are transported to Colombia, often via smuggling in order to avoid\napplicable Colombian law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/28FQSkOPX7c/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/28FQSkOPX7c?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The exact size and structure of the BMPE system cannot be determined with any degree of precision. However, based on anecdotal law enforcement evidence, informants' statements, and Colombian law enforcement and intelligence officials, it is believed that&nbsp;&nbsp;more than 7&nbsp;&nbsp;billion USD is laundered annually.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Other sources of demand for BMPE dollars include capital outflows by Colombian residents, who seek either to conceal the funds from the Colombian authorities or simply to take advantage of the favorable BMPE exchange rate.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hawala is a money\ntransfer system widely used in Arab countries and South Asia. The money is paid\nto an agent who instructs an associate in the relevant country to pay it to the\nfinal recipient. In hawala transactions, money enters the hawala system in\nlocal currency and leaves as foreign currency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hawala is the\nundocumented transfer of money. Most of the hawala done now is based on net-off\nbasis. It is all about not getting the money in the documented field, so that\ntaxation or source of funding is not questioned..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To put it simply, it is\nillegal/informal transfer of money without moving it physically, leaving no\ntraces or evidences. Since no official records are maintained, the source of\nthe money cannot be traced. No requirement of any id proof and disclosure of\nsource of income is there..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The commission rates for transferring money through\nhawala are quite low.. Most of the time illiterate Indian labourers in Dubai\nknow of no other way\u2014they are scared.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have one day Friday off, when the\nbanks have a holiday. What can they do?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The unique feature of the system is\nthat no promissory instruments are exchanged between the hawala brokers; the\ntransaction takes place entirely on the honour system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The total hawala\ntransfers worldwide at about $150 billion per year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hawala brokers who are\ntaking part in a transaction sit distant apart. They usually communicate\nthrough mobile phone or satellite phone or email and most of the transactions\nhappen without meeting the other person.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let\u2019s say Mr A in Abu\nDhabi wants to transfer 1 lakh riyal to his brother say Mr B in Karachi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now A contacts X, who\nis a hawaladar in Abu Dhabi and gives him 1 lakh riyal and also a password.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now X contacts Y,\nanother Hawaladar (his counterpart) in Karachi and asks him to pay 1 lakh riyal\n(in local currency in this case Rupees) after deducting the commission which is\nusually 2%.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">B would be informed by\nA about the the password.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now B will contact Y,\ntells the password and collects the money (2% commission is deducted)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now X owes Y money\nwhich is settled later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hawala agents or\nbrokers run some business other than the hawala agency. So they have surplus of\nliquid money in hand to carry out the transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The demonetisation\ndrive in India has forced hawala operators to find new ways to turn black money\ninto white, especially in the Gulf region.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The modus operandi: An\nNRI gives 3,500 dirhams to a hawala agent. The former gets Rs 1.5 lakh in\nIndia, albeit in the scrapped Rs 500 and Rs 1,000 notes. The present exchange\nrate of 3500 dirhams is around Rs 64,000, doubling the profit. As the amount is\nbelow Rs 2.5 lakh, no queries will be made while depositing the amount.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This money uses the\n'hawala' route, an informal money transfer system, where rupee gets converted\nto dollar at a premium to market exchange rates. In the process, Indian black\nmoney is invested in Dubai property. And since Dubai charges no tax on rental\nincome or any capital gains for purchased property, cash-rich Indians know\ntheir investments are safe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As hawala transactions\nare not routed through banks they cannot be regulated by the government\nagencies and have thus emerged as a major cause of concern. This network is\nbeing used extensively across the globe to circulate black money and to provide\nfunds for terrorism, drug trafficking and other illegal activities.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In India,\nFEMA (Foreign Exchange Management Act) 2000 and PMLA ( Prevention of Money\nLaundering Act) 2002 are the two major legislations which make such\ntransactions illegal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">United States law\nenforcement authorities have observed that as money laundering schemes become\nmore complex, the perpetrators turn to the learned expertise of attorneys,\naccountants, consultants and agent representatives to aid them in the movement\nof illegal currency.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These professionals, using shell corporations, nominees\nand fictitious records, devise elaborate paper trails to disguise the true\nsource of illegal income .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All over the world&nbsp;\nattorneys, accountants and consultants were sentenced as a result of\nmoney laundering convictions. &nbsp;In India\nwe are in the category of ALICE IN WONDERLAND<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The agencies have\nstarted a pan national scrutiny of total gold imports to the country after demonetization\non 8<sup>th</sup> Nov 2016<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The agencies have been\ncollating and tallying&nbsp; the details of\nthe gold sales at various places in the country with the gold imports between\nNovember 8 and December 31.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SOME GOLD HOARDING KERALA\nBLADE COMPANIES HAVE LOOTED THEIR OWN GOLD.&nbsp;\nTHEY ARE LAUGHING NOW.. &nbsp;VERY SOON\nTHEY WILL BE CRYING IN JAIL.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://yourstory.com/2016/09/gold-smuggling-india/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://yourstory.com/2016/09/gold-smuggling-india/</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>THE ONLY WAY TO CHECK THE HAWALA MONEY OF KERALLA ( MORE THAN 26000 CRORES EVERY YEAR ) IS TO FIND OUT HOW MUCH MONEY A MAN IN SAY DUBAI EARNS AS SALARY , HOW MUCH HE SAVES AND HOW MUCH HE HAS BROUGHT HOME BY BANKING CHANNELS.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>MIND YOU LOT OF GOLD COMES IN WHEN AN NRI COMES ON LEAVE --HIDDEN HERE AND THERE&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>THE ONLY WAY TO END THIS MENACE IS TO USE RETIRED NRI GULF RETURNEES PEOPLE AS WHISTLE BLOWERS . &nbsp;IF THEY ARE DESH BHAKTS THEY WILL REVEAL.</b></span><br />\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ED has been on high\nalert following the arrest of two Axis Bank staff who allegedly operated in\nconnivance with a group to convert demonetised currency into gold. &nbsp;&nbsp;As per norms, gold is imported into the\ncountry mostly through registered banks and private firms.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ED\nofficers said they suspect many gold merchants have set up shell companies and\ndemonetised currencies were deposited in accounts of these companies which were\nlater wired to importers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY SHIP HAS ONCE\nCARRIED A FULL LOAD OF CAUSTIC SODA TO A SOUTH AMERICAN NATION FROM USA. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER DISCHARGE WE\nWAITED FOR THREE HOURS AND LOADED THE SAME CARGO BACK TO THE SAME LOAD\nPORT.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I GOT INSIDE\nINFORMATION FROM A CARGO SURVEYOR WHO IS IN CHARGE OF THE QUALITY AND QUANTITY\nCERTIFICATE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I DID MY OWN QUALITY\nTESTS ON BOARD.&nbsp; THE CARGO WAS THE SAME.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">I WONDER IF THE\nSMUGGLING WAS GOLD OR SOME DRUG</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE ASK THE GOVT\u2014DO NOT ALLOW JEW ROTHSCHILDs\nBANKERS TO DICTATE TERMS IN INDIA<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT TOLERATE THIS<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">AND PM MODI\u2014 STOP PRETENDING THAT YOU DON\u2019T\nKNOW WHO BRANDED YOU WITH APCO.</span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE ARE NOW LOSING PATIENCE</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gold is known to play a\nsignificant role in international money laundering. Gold, just like certain\ncurrencies (e.g., the U.S. dollar, Swiss franc, and British pound, the Euro) is\na nearly universal commodity for international commerce.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gold has been a key\nmedium of exchange since antiquity and will, in fact, most likely always enjoy\nthis position, as it appears nearly immune to the consequences of changing\nglobal fortunes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD WANT THE\n54,000 TONNES OF GOLD IN PRIVATE HANDS OF INDIA\u2026&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS SOON AS HIS AGENT RAGHURAM\nRAJAN TOOK OVER RBI CHAIR, HE LIKE A POPSHOT ORDERED KERALA TEMPLES TO DECLARE\nTHEIR PRIVATE GOLD.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WE TOLD THIS ROTHSCHILD\nAGENT&nbsp; TO CATCH AND SWING\u2014NAY--FUCK OFF\n..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gold serves as both a\ncommodity and, to a lesser extent, a medium of exchange in money laundering\nconducted in Latin America, the United States, Europe and Asia. In this cycle,\nfor example, gold bullion makes its way to Italy via Swiss brokers. There it is\nmade into jewelry, much of which is then shipped to Latin America. In Latin\nAmerica, this jewelry (or the raw gold from which it was made) then becomes\none, if not the most important, of the commodities in the black market peso\nexchange.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">United States law\nenforcement authorities identified a money laundering system that makes use of\nthe legitimate gold trade to launder money through black market currency\nexchanges. In this system, gold jewelry is sold in the Panama Colon Free Trade\nZone to Colombians (who are allegedly hoarding gold against the devaluation of\nthe peso). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The jewelry is smuggled\ninto Colombia through the city of Bucaramanga. The jewelry is then melted and\nformed to resemble gold from mines, fabricated into pigment and then shipped to\nthe U.S. for refining. (The pigment fabrication stage is important because the\nColombian government will pay a 4.5 percent export tax credit on the exported\ngoods.) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \"gold\npigment\" arrives in the U.S. but is instead entered as\n\"bullion\", which does not qualify for the export credit. The gold is\nrefined and sold in the U.S. and then smuggled back to South America. The\nresulting loss to the Colombian government is estimated to be over $20 million.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A variant of this\nscheme has the refined gold being exported to Switzerland for sale to Italian\njewelry manufacturers for delivery to Panama.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A review of SARs filed\nby gaming establishments reveals patterns of suspicious activity in which\ncasino accounts are used to transfer significant amounts of funds through\nnon-bank financial transaction channels.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The funds are cashed out by the client\nor moved to other accounts with minimal or no gaming activity. Variations on\nthis theme involved an initial deposit by wire or bank cashiers check, but then\nthe funds would be wired out to another account.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The funds were then stored for\na period of time in a casino safety deposit box or held in the form of\nsafekeeping markers, and then cashed out. In several instances the client was\nobserved transferring chips to other individuals to cash out, as well as\ncashing out a greater amount than held on deposit (with no gambling winnings to\naccount for the excess amount).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It's a real-life heist\nthat sounds straight out of Hollywood: $101 million in stolen funds, taken from\na secure account, disappeared into a murky world of casinos and money\nlaundering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If that's not enough\ndrama, the caper involves at least four countries, a central bank and a pillar\nof the U.S. financial system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was a complex\noperation that required many months of planning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When banks were closed\nfor the weekend in Bangladesh, criminals executed five transfers from the\ncentral bank's account at the New York Fed. The requests looked real: They\nappeared to come from a Bangladesh server, and the thieves supplied the correct\nbank codes to authenticate the transfers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the stolen\nfunds ended up in accounts located in the Philippines, while roughly $20\nmillion, which has since been recovered, went to Sri Lanka. The robbers tried\nto steal $850 million more, but the requests were denied by the New York Fed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The theft, forced the\nresignation of Atiur Rahman, the governor of Bangladesh's central bank. It has\nalso raised questions over the international banking system's vulnerability.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The missing $81 million\nwas tracked to Rizal Commercial Banking Corporation, a bank in the country.\nFrom there, it went to a local money-transfer firm, and then into the country's\ncasinos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">$81 million was\ndeposited into accounts at RCBC. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nsame day, nearly $500,000 was withdrawn from one of the accounts and loaded\ninto a car that was allegedly later driven away by a branch manager in Manilla.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Four days later, as\nalarm bells began to ring, RCBC tried to freeze the accounts with stolen funds.\nBut the bank manager ignored the order from headquarters and quickly moved much\nof the money out of the bank.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From RCBC, the funds\nwent to money-transfer company Philrem, which moved them to casinos and\nindividuals connected to the gaming industry.. Once the money entered the\ncasinos, however, the trail went cold. This is why casinos exist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money laundering has\nlong plagued casinos all over the planet &nbsp;which largely operate beyond the reach of\nanti-money laundering authorities. The U.S. Department of State, among others,\nhas identified the country's gaming industry as a nexus for illegal activity\nand money laundering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: x-large;\">WE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO\nSHUT DOWN CASINOS IN GOA USED BY JEWISH DRUG MAFIA.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/jewish-russian-mafia-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/jewish-russian-mafia-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Transnational drug\ntrafficking organizations based in East Asia use the existing banking system,\ncasinos, and commercial enterprises to transfer drug proceeds from the\nPhilippines to offshore accounts.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">THIS BLOGSITE ASKS THE FINANCE MINISTRY TO MAKE A </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DEDICATED RISK </span></span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ASSESSMENT</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">&nbsp;FORM</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"> FOR SHELL COMPANIES</span></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS FORM MUST BE SIGNED AND FILED --</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WARNING : WRONG FILLING MAY CAUSE INCARCERATION&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/nMLOE7brAOM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/nMLOE7brAOM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/LfNIuYzFyiw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/LfNIuYzFyiw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/CJy41EaZ9gs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/CJy41EaZ9gs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>READ THE LINK BELOW--I AM JUMPING OFF THE DEEP END HERE</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.fintrac-canafe.gc.ca/publications/rba/rba-eng.asp\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://www.fintrac-canafe.gc.ca/publications/rba/rba-eng.asp</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.wolfsberg-principles.com/pdf/home/Wolfsberg-Risk-Assessment-FAQs-2015.pdf\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.wolfsberg-principles.com/pdf/home/Wolfsberg-Risk-Assessment-FAQs-2015.pdf</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Financial Action\nTask Force (FATF) recently produced a report entitled \u201cAnti-money laundering\nand counter-terrorist financing measures: United States \u2013 Mutual Evaluation\nReport.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Financial Action\nTask Force (FATF) is an inter-governmental body established in 1989 by the\nMinisters of its Member jurisdictions.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The objectives of the FATF are to set standards and promote effective\nimplementation of legal, regulatory and operational measures for combating\nmoney laundering, terrorist financing and other related threats to the\nintegrity of the international financial system.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The FATF is therefore a \u201cpolicy-making body\u201d\nwhich works to generate the necessary political will to bring about national\nlegislative and regulatory reforms in these areas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India is a full-fledged\nmember of Financial Action Task Force (FATF), ( since 2010 ) an\ninter-governmental body, responsible for setting global standards on anti-money\nlaundering (AML) and combating the financing of terrorism (CFT).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India will\nbenefit in securing a more transparent and stable financial system by ensuring\nthat financial institutions are not vulnerable to infiltration or abuse by\norganized crime groups. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In its first evaluation\nof the United States in ten years, FATF scored Washington non-compliant - the\nlowest possible score - on its ability to determine the true owners of shell\ncompanies, sometimes used by money launderers to hide illegal proceeds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FATF also gave\nWashington a failing score for its minimal monitoring of non-financial\nindustries sometimes used in money laundering, such as law firms and realtors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, unlike\nbanks, real estate agents in the United States are not required to notify\nauthorities if they suspect a customer is trying to move dirty money through\nproperty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FATF criticized many of\nthese shortcomings in its last evaluation of the United States, raising\nconcerns about why Washington had still not acted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Obama\nadministration proposed legislation to mandate companies to disclose beneficial\nowners in&nbsp; but Congress has not\nintroduced the bill<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe U.S. views itself\nas a standard setter among nations,\u201d said&nbsp;\na Washington-based anti-money laundering attorney. \u201cBut in key areas, it\nfails to measure up to international standards, which opens the doors to Panama\npapers-type transactions and schemes to hide money.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHOM SHALL WE THANK ? &nbsp; &nbsp; THE JEWS OF COURSE !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FQh0z1qz9G4/WLfdIKf9PoI/AAAAAAABRUc/4I-Puu2uBVskFI9OAyqv1CQyEbYHqLoCACLcB/s1600/know-ultimate-beneficial-VVowner-face-consequences-infographic.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FQh0z1qz9G4/WLfdIKf9PoI/AAAAAAABRUc/4I-Puu2uBVskFI9OAyqv1CQyEbYHqLoCACLcB/s1600/know-ultimate-beneficial-VVowner-face-consequences-infographic.png\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nearly $1.4 trillion of\nillicit money, derived largely from corruption, tax evasion, and money\nlaundering, flowed out of China between 2004 and 2013, according to think tank\nGlobal Financial Integrity. Much of that went through Hong Kong, say the\nfinancial crime experts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leaked documents from\nPanama law firm Mossack Fonseca, which contained information on 214,000\noffshore companies, showed that its Hong Kong offices were its busiest\nglobally.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It worked with more than 2,200 banks, accountants, law firms and\nother middlemen in the city to funnel money from China and elsewhere into\nnearly 37,700 entities registered in secretive locations such as the British\nVirgin Islands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The scandal also\nexposed the widespread practice among Hong Kong companies of creating offshore\nentities to act as shareholders, shielding the identity of real owners.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Companies principally based in the BVI were the largest source of direct\ninvestment in Hong Kong resident enterprises and the largest source of annual\ninvestment inflows between 2013 and 2015<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FATF can put a\njurisdiction on a blacklist if it is uncooperative in the battle against money\nlaundering. While that doesn't trigger any formal sanctions, it can make banks,\ncompanies and other entities very wary about doing business with that place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>########### &nbsp; SUBJECT---- GURMEHAR KAUR :&nbsp; &nbsp;TRUTH\nKEJRIWAL POODLE&nbsp; ---- MALALA OF\nKHALISTANIS &nbsp; &nbsp;#############<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>KARGIL WAR ENDED IN JULY 1999\u2026\u2026.&nbsp;
