, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Crores\nof money transferred through RTGS transfers to some shell companies included\ncases where directors were servants, maids , cooks and drivers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">After\ndemonetisation of high denomination notes BIG FISH used slave Indian bank\nmanagers of desh drohi foreign banks to back date records and launder they\nhoarded money.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BIG\nFISH &nbsp;having old currencies converted\nthose old notes into gold even at inflated rates.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\ngovt must know that in India many gold jewellery shops are just fronts to\nlaunder money.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Persons\nwith hoarded cash ( demonetization period ) were pro-actively contacted by the\njewelers who collected such cash from these parties as advances against gold to\nbe sold at high prices ranging from Rs 45000-50000 per 10 gm<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\ncash so collected was laundered through banking channels with the help of\nlaunderers who are professionally qualified CAs and managing shell companies\nand finally payments from such companies were made through RTGS to bullion\ndealers and the physical gold so purchased at market rate of Rs 31000-32000/ 10\ngm was handed over to the persons from whom advances were received<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shell\ncompanies which had bank accounts in foreign banks used to deposit cash to the\ntune of Rs 39 crore between 10-22 November 2016 in close connivance with bank\nmanagers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nwhite JEWS of &nbsp;foreign banks cried\u2014 \u201cWe\nare appalled . We will punish our Indian bank managers \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Sorry,\nwe want the govt to jail these desh drohi &nbsp;banker bastards by a jail term \u2013NOT fines or\nsuspensions .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE &nbsp;CURRENT BANK STRIKE IS SPONSORED BY KOSHER\nFOREIGN BANKS USING THEIR SLAVE LABOUR UNION LEADERS ---TO TWIST THE ARMS OF\nTHE GOVT, SO THAT THEY DON\u2019T PUNISH THESE DESH DROHI BANK MANAGERS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/banking/finance/banking/unions-go-ahead-with-bank-strike-services-suffer/articleshow/57387241.cms\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/banking/finance/banking/unions-go-ahead-with-bank-strike-services-suffer/articleshow/57387241.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>GOVT MUST NOT CAPITULATE TO THE BANK UNION LEADERS-- &nbsp;EXTREME PAIN &nbsp;FOR THESE FOREIGN PAYROLL SLAVES , IS THE ANSWER&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nbank's staff exploited a loophole to convert old currency notes by buying gold\nin the name of shell companies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DURING THE DEMONITISATION\nPERIOD THERE WAS A SURGE IN THE SALE OF GOLD USING BACK DATED VOUCHERS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gold was sold on\nthe basis of fabricated, back-dated receipts\u2014and scrapped notes were accepted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smurfs, shell companies\nand Reserve bank remittance loop ( extended period DELIBERATELY provided--- <b><span style=\"color: red;\">BRAAAAYYYYY</span></b> ) hole did the trick<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell firms were used\nto place orders with the jewellers to buy the gold irregularly in lieu of\nscrapped notes and if payments were made using bank accounts with connivance of\nforeign bank SLAVE Indian managers</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Real-time gross\nsettlement are specialist funds transfer systems where the transfer of money or\nsecurities takes place from one bank to another on a \"real time\" and\non a \"gross\" basis. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike, other fund\ntransfer systems RTGS allows you to make money transfers of large amounts, in\nIndia as long as they are over Rs.2 lakhs. RTGS allows people to transfer money\nif their bank has an IFSC code which is assigned to each bank branch under the\nNEFT and RTGS system by the Reserve Bank of India.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike NEFT money transfer\nmethod, where the transactions take place in hourly batches, RTGS transactions\ntake place individually.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Settlement in\n\"real time\" means a payment transaction is not subjected to any\nwaiting period, with transactions being settled as soon as they are processed.\n\"Gross settlement\" means the transaction is settled on one-to-one\nbasis without bundling or netting with any other transaction.\n\"Settlement\" means that once processed, payments are final and\nirrevocable. RTGS systems are typically used for high-value transactions that\nrequire and receive immediate clearing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In some countries the RTGS systems may\nbe the only way to get same day cleared funds and so may be used when payments\nneed to be settled urgently. However, most regular payments would not use a\nRTGS system, but instead would use a national payment system or network that\nallows participants to batch and net payments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here are the main\nfeatures of an RTGS transaction that one should be aware of before using it:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The recipient\u2019s and\nsender\u2019s banks\u2019 IFSC code along their account numbers should be available.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A minimum of Rs.2 lakhs\nhas to be sent through RTGS. NEFT and UPI can be used as alternative ways for\nmoney transfers if the amount is less than Rs.1 lakh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On a given day, a\nmaximum of Rs. 10 lakhs can be transferred through RTGS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These transactions can\nbe queued in well in advance, especially for special payments such as tax,\nhedge funds or cash management transfer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The scheduling for the\nfunds allowed, varies from bank to bank and the purpose of transfer of money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The transfer when\naccepted by RBI has to credited within 30 minutes of the request.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the money does not\nget credited, regardless of the reasons, the money has to credited bank to the\nsender\u2019s bank within an hour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/noida-it-raids-axis-bank-branch-seizes-20-accounts-with-rs-60-crore/story-Ld9zJjfy6pSOQRHitlIg1N.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/noida-it-raids-axis-bank-branch-seizes-20-accounts-with-rs-60-crore/story-Ld9zJjfy6pSOQRHitlIg1N.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Co-operative bank\nmanagers in Kerala did endless fraud, supported by the politicians and their\nATTIMARI goons</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Enforcement\nDirectorate (ED) has arrested two managers from Axis Bank for their alleged\ninvolvement in converting Rs 40 crore of old Rs 500 and 1,000 notes into new\ncurrency notes through online transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The accused, identified\nas Shashnk Sinha and Vinit Gupta, were posted in the Kashmere Gate branch of\nthe bank where they allegedly assisted in money laundering with the help of\nassociates, including a chartered accountant, besides shell companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The managers repeatedly\nused Aadhaar cards and other documents of several bank customers who had\ndeposited old currency notes to commit the crime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cash deposits were\nmade in multiple installments of Rs 90 to Rs 99 lakh to evade detection by the\ngovernment agencies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The scam was detected\nafter the Delhi Police seized Rs 3.7 crore in old notes from three persons\noutside the Kashmere Gate branch on November 22,&nbsp;&nbsp; 2016. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several shell companies\nsuch as Sunrise Trading, Himalaya International and RD Traders have their bank\naccounts with the Kashmere Gate branch.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThey deposited huge tranche of demonetised cash between November 10 and\n22 , 2016,&nbsp; in connivance with the bank\nmanagers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Imagine, a Swiss bank,\ntells its client to close an account and open one with an American custodian\nbank. The client then appoints the Swiss bank as investment manager on the\ncustodian account, and that bank instructs the custodian which funds to buy,\noften the Swiss bank\u2019s own products.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Swiss bank earns fees for advice and\nfund-management; the custodian picks up business; and the account is deemed for\nregulatory purposes to be American, meaning it avoids the disclosure rules that\napply only to countries signed up to the CRS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Common Reporting\nStandard (CRS), developed in response to the G20 request and approved by the\nOECD Council on 15 July 2014, calls on jurisdictions to obtain information from\ntheir financial institutions and automatically exchange that information with\nother jurisdictions on an annual basis.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It sets out the financial account\ninformation to be exchanged, the financial institutions required to report, the\ndifferent types of accounts and taxpayers covered, as well as common due\ndiligence procedures to be followed by financial institutions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More Than 100\nJurisdictions Including Dubai, Hong Kong, Singapore and Switzerland, Have\nCommitted to Implement the CRS, an Internationally Agreed Standard<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;India is part of this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Organisation for\nEconomic Co-operation and Development (OECD) &nbsp;is an intergovernmental economic organisation\nwith 35 member countries, to stimulate economic progress and world trade.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each country will\nannually automatically exchange with the other country the below information in\nthe case of Jurisdiction A with respect to each Jurisdiction B Reportable\nAccount, and in the case of Jurisdiction B with respect to each Jurisdiction A\nReportable Account:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--the name, address,\nTaxpayer Identification Number and date and place of birth of each Reportable\nPerson.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--the account number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--the name and\nidentifying number of the Reporting Financial Institution;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--the account balance\nor value as of the end of the relevant calendar or, if the account was closed\nduring such year or period, the closure of the account</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The totality of the\ninformation and its format are governed by a hugely detailed standard (Hence\nstandard in the name), whose details are listed in a rule book hundreds of\npages long.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than $2 trillion\nin U.S.-based multinational profits currently sit in offshore accounts,\nrepresenting, by credible estimates, in excess of $500 billion in unpaid\ntaxes.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And every year that Congress\ndithers on a crackdown, America is forfeiting an approximate $90 billion in\nrevenue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The biggest names in\ncorporate America are boycotting the U.S. tax system, en masse. Top offenders\ninclude giants from high-tech (Microsoft, $76 billion); Big Pharma (Pfizer, $69\nbillion); Big Oil (Exxon\u00adMobil, $47 billion); investment banks (Goldman Sachs,\n$22 billion); Big Tobacco (Philip Morris, $20 billion); discount retailers\n(Wal-Mart, $19 billion); fast-food chains (McDonald's, $16 billion) \u2013 even\nheavy machinery (Caterpillar, $17 billion). General Electric has $110 billion\nstashed offshore, and enjoys an effective tax rate of four percent \u2013 31 points\nlower than its statutory obligation to the IRS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You've got so many big,\npowerful corporations doing it that it's the norm\u2014proof that a KOSHER shadow\ngovt rules USA . Let us see if Trump can drain the kosher swamp.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">PURAANA MAAL MAGTHA HAI KYA ?</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://wyomingcompany.com/aged-corporation/?gclid=CjwKEAiA3NTFBRDKheuO6IG43VQSJAA74F77zYcw8NX0btBYlG1T-PcLtes0MTdYGDfPm1cyR9DnkRoCwmLw_wcB\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://wyomingcompany.com/aged-corporation/?gclid=CjwKEAiA3NTFBRDKheuO6IG43VQSJAA74F77zYcw8NX0btBYlG1T-PcLtes0MTdYGDfPm1cyR9DnkRoCwmLw_wcB</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Shelf Corporation is\na company that was created years ago for the sole purpose of being sold in the\nfuture simply for the value of its age.A shelf corporation, shelf company, or\naged corporation is a company or corporation that has had no activity. It was\ncreated and left with no activity \u2013 metaphorically put on the \"shelf\"\nto \"age\"..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shelf companies are formed and sold usually by accounting\nor law firms. The older the entity is the more valuable potentially it becomes,\nand the more you will have to pay for it. The number one reason people want an\naged entity to improve their chances of getting loans and credit\u2014 you make an\nass out of people. People take you more seriously when you are a corporate\nentity.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Again, PM Modi please\nnote-- Make all shell companies ILLEGAL. I know its legal now but even the best\nones are just tax avoiders<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">If start up capital\ncannot be explained, sieze the asset.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThis goes largely back to shell companies.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">Saying \"Ghost inc gave me the\nmoney\" should not be sufficient.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nHow did they earn it? If there is no description, sieze it.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Indian\ncollegium&nbsp; judiciary just don't want to\ndeal with white collar crime.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">We know\nwhy they are after Subrata Roy\u2019s ass\u2014all in good time<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">We've all seen it in\naction: a poor man&nbsp; is busted for&nbsp; shoplifting or picking pockets or whatever\nand they're sent to jail as undertials .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Someone defrauds a company and the proceedings take years, if they\nhappen at all. Straight into the too-hard basket.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6553487970161137372\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_96.html?showComment=1488347141861#c6329440434533259656\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 1, 2017 at 11:15 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_31MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi p,<br />\n<br />\nFlipkart is an electronic commerce company headquartered in Bangalore, Karnataka. It was founded in 2007 by Sachin Bansal and Binny Bansal. The company is registered in Singapore\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe current market value of Flipkart is around 6 billion USD.<br />\n<br />\nFlipkart now employs more than 33,000 people-- Flipkart were operating through a complex business structure which included nine firms, some registered in Singapore and some in India<br />\n<br />\nSachin Bansal and Binny Bansal, ( not related to each other ) learnt the tricks of the trade from AMAZON and left to create their new company incorporated in October 2007 as Flipkart Online Services Pvt. Ltd.<br />\n<br />\nDIGRESSION: Last time when my Hitachi AC remote controls ( body movement seeking ) stopped working , I could NOT get it even from the company HQ \u2014 I got it via Amazon ( absolutely priceless service for me ). In Kerala humidity is too high.<br />\n<br />\nFlipkart received mass criticism on the subject of net neutrality after their announced partnership with Airtel to use the Airtel Zero platform which would have made the Flipkart app free for Airtel Users. On 14 April 2015 Flipkart retracted its decision to use Airtel Zero platform<br />\n<br />\nFlipkart.com was awarded Young Turk of the Year at CNBC TV 18's 'India Business Leader Awards 2012' (IBLA).<br />\n<br />\nThe CUNTS don\u2019t know that YOUNG TURKS are Jews who kicked out the Turkish Sultan and inserted a Donmeh Jew named Mustafa Kemal Ataturk in place.<br />\n<br />\nFlipcart\u2019s structure is like a shell company. Even the founder don't live there. Are there any Flipkart employees working in Singapore?<br />\n<br />\nIsn't it created for the purpose of avoiding Indian taxes. Why government is not forcing Flipkart of incorporate it's business in India when it's entire show is run in India?<br />\n<br />\nA company who makes its profits in India must be taxed in India.<br />\n<br />\nIn this case, company operates completely in India and incorporated in Singapore. Isn't it obvious that it's a shell company.<br />\n<br />\nIf that's the case, why does Google uses Google India Private Limited for charging billing it's client?<br />\n<br />\nFlipcart must be asked to be transparent in its website OR be asked to shut down its operations .<br />\n<br />\nThey employ many CAs and lawyers in India and no one have required knowledge to explain this structure.<br />\n<br />\nASK WHISTLE BLOWERS WHO LEFT FLIPKART TO SPILL THE BEANS.<br />\n<br />\nFlipkart is registered in Singapore because :---<br />\nIt is easier to get funding from international VCs.<br />\nCorporate tax is almost half of what is levied in India.<br />\nFDI in online retail doesn't allow more than 51%<br />\nFlipkart did not think of registering at Singapore until 2011, when it decided to rename the Indian arm as WS Retail which is registered in Bangalore.<br />\nThe ultimate holding company is Flipkart Pvt Ltd.<br />\n<br />\nFlipkart isn't a Online retailer which it was when it started, currently it is only a market place and Flipkart doesn't sell anything. It is only WS Retail which sells.<br />\n<br />\nHullo\u2014my friend ARUN ---does WS Retail pay taxes? Taxes are paid only when there is profit. We all know the profit margin !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_32b+seedaFcD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_32b+seedaFcD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n</b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>DONALD TRUMP MUST CRUSH\nSHELL COMPANIES IN USA . <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>TRUMP MUST LEAD THE\nPLANET IN ELIMINATING THE SCOURGE OF KOSHER SHELL COMPANIES . BILDERBERG INNER\nCLUB WILL NOT BE HAPPY.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">EFFICIENT USE OF SHELL\nCOMPANIES IS ALWAYS AN ITEM IN THE MEETING AGENDA</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/shrewd-club-within-naive-bilderberg.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/shrewd-club-within-naive-bilderberg.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An excuse given by rich\nJews is that SHELL companies also help protect their privacy &nbsp;including hiding personal wealth ( like\nexpensive art ) to diminish the risk of kidnapping.&nbsp; This is KOSHER bullshit\u2014hire a fuckin\u2019 guard.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sham companies that\ntricked elderly people into investing in worthless business schemes, laundering\nmillions of dollars from Mexican drug cartels, accepting political bribes,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">U.S. firms are legally\nprohibited from knowingly helping customers to avoid taxes, but they can offer\nthem privacy and secrecy, and ask very few questions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is all this bullshit\n?</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2010, ( effective\nfrom July 1, 2014.) the United States implemented legislation called the\nForeign Account Tax Compliance Act, or FATCA, in hopes of catching American tax\ncheats.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was done in an\neffort to deter those considering hiding their assets in offshore accounts or\nshell companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The law required financial firms around the\nworld to report accounts held by U.S. citizens to the Internal Revenue Service\n\u2013 or else face being frozen out of the U.S. financial system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FATCA was developed to\nreduce offshore tax evasion and regain federal tax revenues from American\naccount holders at foreign (non-American) financial institutions\ninternationally.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The impetus for the Act\nwas a 2009 court case in which Swiss Bank UBS was found to have assisted\nAmerican nationals to evade paying American taxes. As a result, UBS agreed to\npay the United States (US) government US$780 million in fines, restitution and\nprovide the names of suspected tax cheats.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The use of offshore\nbank accounts to avoid paying American taxes costs the US Treasury, in total,\nat least 300 billion USD &nbsp;billion\nannually.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FATCA requires:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2013&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; individuals to report their financial\naccounts held outside of the United States, and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2013&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; foreign (that is, non-US) financial\ninstitutions to report to the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) about their\nAmerican clients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To enforce the FATCA,\nit has become necessary for the US government to sign agreements with foreign\ngovernments allowing the trade of individuals\u2019 financial data<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On May 9, 2016, the\nJustice Department announced that Gregg R. Mulholland, a dual U.S. and Canadian\ncitizen and owner of an offshore broker-dealer and investment management\ncompany based in Panama and Belize, pleaded guilty to money laundering\nconspiracy for fraudulently manipulating the stocks of more than 40 U.S.\npublicly-traded companies and then laundering more than $250 million in profits\nthrough at least five offshore law firms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mulholland and several\nother defendants were indicted in 2014 by a grand jury in the Eastern District\nof New York.&nbsp; The indictment alleges that\nbetween 2010 and 2014, Mulholland controlled a group of individuals (the\nMulholland Group) who together devised three interrelated schemes to--:&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(1)\ninduce U.S. investors to purchase stock in various thinly-traded U.S. public\ncompanies through fraudulent promotion of the stock, concealment of their\nownership interests in the companies, and fraudulent manipulation of artificial\nprice movements and trading volume in the stocks of those companies;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(2)\ncircumvent the IRS\u2019s reporting requirements under FATCA; and</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;(3) launder the\nfraudulent proceeds from the stock manipulation schemes to and from the United\nStates through five offshore law firms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the\nindictment, the defendants\u2019 scheme also enabled U.S. clients to evade reporting\nrequirements to the IRS by concealing the proceeds generated by the manipulated\nstock transactions through the shell companies and their nominees.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The indictment alleges\nthat in order to carry out these interrelated schemes, the Mulholland Group\nused shell companies in Belize and Nevis, West Indies, which had nominees at\nthe helm.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This structure was designed to conceal the Mulholland Group\u2019s\nownership interest in the stock of U.S. public companies, in violation of U.S.\nsecurities laws, and enabled the Mulholland Group to engage in more than 40\n\u201cpump and dump\u201d schemes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The indictment reveals\nthat law enforcement authorities employed undercover agents and wiretaps to\nrecord numerous conversations involving the defendants.&nbsp; In one recorded meeting, two of the defendants\nbragged that their strategy enabled clients to evade FATCA\u2019s requirements<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On a recorded telephone\ncall, one of the defendants told a client that the use of offshore nominee\ncompanies was specifically intended to evade FATCA\u2019s reporting requirements<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://www.irs.gov/businesses/corporations/summary-of-fatca-reporting-for-u-s-taxpayers\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.irs.gov/businesses/corporations/summary-of-fatca-reporting-for-u-s-taxpayers</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span><br />\n<b style=\"font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt;\">TAX EVASION AND SHELL COMPANIES MUST BE PART\nOF THE ECONOMICS SYLLABUS IN INDIAN SCHOOLS. &nbsp;</b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c106725232399014880\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_34M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_96.html?showComment=1488349496991#c106725232399014880\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 1, 2017 at 11:54 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA WHORE CNN IS ACCUSING TRUMP OF TELLING A LIE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">QUOTE: Over 43 million people are now living in poverty, and over 43 million Americans are on food stamps. UNQUOTE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/president-donald-trumps-first-speech-to-congress-full-text/articleshow/57403154.cms</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">THE TRUTH IS ONE IN 6 AMERICANS SURVIVE ON FOOD STAMPS AND THE TRUTH TODAY IS 47.1 MILLION STAMPS</span></b></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THE ONLY WAY OUT DONALD TRUMP-- IS TO ENSURE THERE IS NO TAX EVASION AND MONEY LAUNDERING .</span></b></div>\n<b></b><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<b>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span></b>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">20 TRILLION USD DEBT CAN NEVER BE REPAID WITHOUT CRUSHING US SHELL COMPANIES-- THIS CAN PREVENT WW3</span></b></span></b></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span></b>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WE ASK PM MODI<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>GIVE A DEADLINE FOR PEOPLE HOLDING BENAMI\nPROPERTIES AND GRABBED LANDS AND FALSE REGISTRY LANDS TO COME HONEST AND ADMIT<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AFTER THAT THE PUNISHMENT MUST BE MINIMUM TEN\nYEARS JAIL AND LOSS OF PROPERTY.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">PEOPLE WHO ARE IN GENUINE DOUBT MUST APPROACH\nA SPECIAL CELL FOR HELP WITHIN A DEAD LINE</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">EVER HEARD OF JUDGES\nMAKING A CHOOT OUT OF EVERYBODY ( TO CREATE A KNIGHT IN SHINING ARMOUR ) AND ASSISTING CLANDESTINELY IN LAUNDERING MONEY\nFOR A KICK BACK ?</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some 19 British firms\nare at the center of an investigation into in a mammoth global money-laundering\noperation. The scheme was allegedly contrived to make $20bn worth of\nill-gotten gains appear legitimate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The illicit funds are\nthought to have originated from criminal gangs and corrupt officials across the\nglobe, attempting to make their dirty money appear 'clean' so it can be spent\nfree of suspicion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An investigation\ncarried out by The Independent and UK NGO the Organised Crime and Corruption\nReporting Project (OCCRP) uncovered a complex international web of companies,\nwhich are implicated in the scheme.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As part of the probe, a minimum of 19 UK\nfirms are currently under investigation, The Organized Crime and Corruption\nReporting Project (OCCRP), founded in 2006, is a consortium of investigative\ncenters, media and journalists operating in Eastern Europe, the Caucasus,\nCentral Asia and Central America.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OCCRP is the only full-time investigative\nreporting organization that specializes in organized crime and corruption.\nOCCRP\u2019s goal is to help the people of the world understand how organized crime\nand corruption resides in their countries and in their governments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The criminal operation\nhighlights how Britain\u2019s lax regulatory architecture has made the UK a\nparticularly alluring destination for global organized crime syndicates looking\nto launder ill-gotten gains. Because directors of British firms are afforded a\nhigh degree of financial secrecy under UK law, the identities of the scam's\nprimary architects are extremely difficult to determine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cross-border money\nlaundering scheme was in operation for four years before it was uncovered in\nMay by criminal investigators in Moldova. In tandem with Britain, the former\nSoviet republic was one of the scam's core focal points.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vital to the process of\nmoney laundering, is the creation of an impression the funds have been earned\nlegitimately. As a result, criminals often work to cultivate documentation that\nindicates their tainted funds stem from honourable origins.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In past cases,\ncriminals have often taken over legitimate firms for the purpose of laundering\ndirty money. But when illicit funds generated from criminal activity amount to\nbillions, such straightforward schemes become impractical, and more complex\nlaundering operations are required.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the scam, uncovered\nby the Independent and OCCRP, front companies were created in Britain which\nconducted fake and fraudulent business deals amongst one another. These \u2018shell\ncompanies\u2019 subsequently sued one another in Moldovan courts, demanding they be\nrepaid loans amounting to hundreds of millions of pounds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">As part of the scam, a\nMoldovan <span style=\"color: red;\">judge would issue a ruling in favor of the claimant firm</span>, which\nsubsequently received a large payment from the opposing company.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: x-large;\">Related\njudgments resulted in the creation of court documents that legitimised such\ntransactions.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But rather than flow\nfrom one UK firm to another, the funds were channeled from Russia \u2013 an\ninternational money laundering hot spot, which attracts gangs and corrupt\nofficials from across the globe looking to \u2018clean\u2019 ill-gotten gains. Generally\nsuch dirty money stems from political corruption, white collar crime, human\ntrafficking, drug dealing and prostitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the illicit funds\narrived in the accounts of UK front companies in Moldova, the money was\nfunneled into a bank in Latvia. Latvia\u2019s banking system is integrated with the\nEU, and considerably well regulated. As a result, this final phase of the\noperation bolstered the tainted funds'apparent legitimacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of its lax\nfinancial regulation, Britain has become a focal point for money laundering\nschemes. Front companies can be set up on British soil with little oversight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The launderers behind\nthis&nbsp; scam were able to shift the\njurisdiction of their lawsuits to Moldova by employing Moldovan citizens as\nguarantors in their fraudulent business deals. The false debts central to the\noperation were also guaranteed by Russian firms.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The UK firms under\ninvestigation were registered at regular office buildings in London, Belfast,\nEdinburgh, Glasgow and Birmingham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, their true\nownership is obscured by a web of shell companies and nominee directors in\noffshore tax havens, such as the Seychelles, the Bahamas and the Marshall\nIslands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nominee directors are\nthird party individuals officially registered as administrators of offshore\ncompanies. This allows true benefactors or managers to remain entirely\nanonymous. They are often central to aggressive, yet legal, tax avoidance\nschemes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One UK firm under\nsuspicion for involvement in the scam has listed its shareholders as two\nuntraceable firms in Panama and Belize. Another firm, Westburn Enterprises,\nsucceeded in claiming half a billion US dollars from a guarantor in Russia\nthrough Moldovan courts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite allegedly\nconducting such vast transactions, the firm is registered as a small\naccountancy company in Edinburgh called Axiano. Although Westburn Enterprises\nclaims its director is Marios Papntoniou, he is merely the boss of the\nEdinburgh-based accountancy firm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Axiano is not\nimplicated in any criminality, and ultimately has nothing to do with Westburn\u2019s\noperations. Rather, the accountancy outfit is but one of many UK firms that\nlegally sets up offshore companies, which are shrouded in secrecy to guarantee\ntheir anonymity.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aRX3fQUeRCI/WLaZ1pOUzUI/AAAAAAABRTA/TyD02Dy5YDkfrRky0sziKfbx73HZlBaAgCLcB/s1600/imagesCA6DZURW9.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"368\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aRX3fQUeRCI/WLaZ1pOUzUI/AAAAAAABRTA/TyD02Dy5YDkfrRky0sziKfbx73HZlBaAgCLcB/s400/imagesCA6DZURW9.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3807870750884054113\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_47M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_96.html?showComment=1488361695934#c3807870750884054113\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 1, 2017 at 3:18 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_47MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/economy/indicators/gdp-growth-rate-plays-down-note-ban-worry-7-growth-recorded-in-q3/articleshow/57393252.cms<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHEN THIS PLANETS GREATEST WHITE SKINNED ECONOMISTS , AMARTYA SEN, CHIDAMBARAM , MONTEK SINGH AHLUWALIA , MANMOHAN SINGH ETC----</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">--- HAD PREDICTED DOOM FOR INDIAN ECONOMY BECAUSE OF DEMONETIZATION AND A PLUNGE IN GROWTH RATE % --</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WHAT DID CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL SAY?<br /><br /><br />HE SAID THEY ARE A BUNCH OF CHOOTS WHO DO NOT UNDERSTAND ECONOMICS !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS RIGHT ?<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWE MUST GO FOR BTT -- SO THAT WE HEM IN THE ULTRA SKILLED HOME BASED COTTAGE INDUSTRIES --<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nOUR GDP IS FAR GREATER--THE GROWTH RATE IS NOW MORE THAN 10 %<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/abolish-income-tax-in-india-have.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWHY DOES A RETIRED SHIP CAPTAIN NEED TO SAY ALL THIS?<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>ARE THERE NO INTELLIGENT PEOPLE IN INDIA ?</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nPATHETIC !<br />\n<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YN5XCWgSDgo/WLaZtEkZPnI/AAAAAAABRS8/LTWLvb2k5Jcmfrkk4k9Fn7AK41gA3fbFACLcB/s1600/Sndw.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YN5XCWgSDgo/WLaZtEkZPnI/AAAAAAABRS8/LTWLvb2k5Jcmfrkk4k9Fn7AK41gA3fbFACLcB/s400/Sndw.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another UK firm,\nallegedly being probed, is London-registered Valemont Properties. The address\nof its director, Damian James Calderbank, is listed in two Dubai office blocks\nand a London-based office. Calderbank is thought to be a nominee director, and\nutterly unaware of the firm\u2019s activities ( little bo peep syndrome ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But Valemont\nProperties' director reportedly holds an additional 21 UK directorships in\nBritain, has resigned from 333 such positions, and was formally the director of\n227 UK firms that have been dissolved. He is also a director of multiple other\noffshore firms, the Independent\u2019s investigation reveals.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile, Valemont\nProperties\u2019 specially appointed company secretary cannot be questioned about\nthe firm\u2019s suspicious activities because it happens to be a financial vehicle\nlocated in the Bahamas, under the name Hextable Limited.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two other UK firms under\ninvestigation are registered at addresses that correspond to PO Boxes in\nEdinburgh, Shepherd Market and London.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
