Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "122", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1194830821596220155/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "151197593953155404", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-02-28T08:11:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-02-28T20:19:33+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDg4MjkzMzczNzYzCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_65.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/151197593953155404", "title": "SHELL COMPANIES for money laundering, tax evasion, hiding kickbacks, layering PART 7 -- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 6, BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_27.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_27.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Panama Papers\nrelease focused attention on the fact that a number of US states permit the\ncreation of companies and trusts where the identities of the beneficial owners\nare unknown, and that foreigners have been using them to bring possibly tainted\nmoney into the United States.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wall Street\u2019s biggest\nmoney makers&nbsp; are the&nbsp; $3 trillion hedge fund industry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The now-famous Panama\nPapers leak offers rare insight into the workings of this exclusive investment\nclub.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hedge funds accept\nindividual investors with net worths of $1 million or more and worker pension\nfunds with $5 million or more. They and their investors often locate in tax\nhavens such as the Cayman Islands or the British Virgin Islands. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are an estimated\n10,000 hedge funds operating around the world, with more than $3 trillion in\nassets under management.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In response to the\nfinancial crisis of 2008, hedge fund managers and advisers were required,\nbeginning in 2011, to register with regulators if they manage more than $100\nmillion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hedge funds often\nincorporate outside the United States. They can accept foreign investors who\nmay want to avoid the U.S. legal and tax system or Americans trying to limit\ntax liabilities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Hedge funds serve very little\nuseful purpose except to make a few JEWS very rich.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">This kosher club will destroy any non-Jew if\nthey try make money .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/nri/us-canada-news/Indian-origin-hedge-fund-manager-Sanjay-Valvani-commits-suicide-in-US/articleshow/52886383.cms\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/nri/us-canada-news/Indian-origin-hedge-fund-manager-Sanjay-Valvani-commits-suicide-in-US/articleshow/52886383.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hedge funds make big\nreturns by manipulating markets in ways that are illegal for small investors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We know that hedge\nfunds have made a small subset of financial titans fabulously wealthy. The top\nhedge fund executives make a billion dollars a year or more. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hillary Clinton and\nBernie Sanders are fond of saying on the campaign trail that the top 25 hedge\nfund managers earn more than all of America\u2019s kindergarten teachers\ncombined.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hedge funds is an\noffshore investment fund, typically formed as a private limited partnership,\nthat engages in speculation using credit or borrowed capital. A hedge fund is\nan alternative investment vehicle available only to sophisticated investors,\nsuch as institutions and individuals with significant assets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hedge funds are\nprivately-owned companies that pool investors' dollars and reinvest them into\nall kinds of complicated financial instruments. Their goal is to outperform the\nmarket -- by a lot. They are expected to be smart enough to create high returns\nregardless of how the market does. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 8,000 hedge\nfunds managed $2.8 trillion in 2014.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike mutual funds,\nwhose owners are public corporations, hedge funds traditionally weren't\nregulated by the SEC (Securities and Exchange Commission). For this reason, and\nmany others, hedge funds are very risky. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, it is exactly\nthis risk that attracts many investors who believe higher risk leads to higher\nreturn. Hedge funds are set up as limited partnerships or limited liability\ncorporations that protector the manager and investors from creditors if the\nfund goes bankrupt. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hedge fund managers are\ncompensated as a percent of the returns they earn. This attracts many investors\nwho are frustrated by the fact that mutual funds are paid fees, regardless of\nfund performance. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thanks to this\ncompensation structure, hedge fund managers are driven to achieve above-market\nreturns. Hedge funds managers are paid a percentage of their funds' returns.\nWhat happens if the fund loses money? Do they pay the fund a percentage of that\nloss? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No, the managers get\nzero no matter how much money they lose. This structure means hedge funds\nmanagers are very risk tolerant. This makes the funds very risky for the\ninvestor, who can lose all the money they invested in the fund. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hedge funds are\ngenerally distinct from mutual funds as their use of leverage is not capped by\nregulators and distinct from private equity funds as the majority of hedge\nfunds invest in relatively liquid assets <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the late 1940s, a\njournalist and sociologist named Alfred Winslow Jones had an idea. He decided\nto buy stocks using borrowed money to magnify his profits. He also bet against\nstocks, profiting if they lost value.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jones\n\"shorted\" stocks, meaning he bet they'd go down.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He called this strategy\n\"hedging\" - and it was in 1949 that he turned this idea into an\ninvestment firm and what is thought to be the first hedge fund. Jones' fund\nmade mega money for his clients, usually rich families, and he became a legend\non Wall Street.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His firm gained 670% in\nthe preceding 10 years, compared with a 358% gain for the leading mutual fund\nof that time<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jews are safe ! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rest will be taken to\nthe cleaners !!</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2016-01-19/ex-goldman-director-rajat-gupta-back-home-after-prison-stay\">https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2016-01-19/ex-goldman-director-rajat-gupta-back-home-after-prison-stay</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kosher club Jews will\ncontinue screwing you even if you are in jail.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No competition please . Only Jews are allowed to make easy dirty money.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.cnbc.com/id/100991730\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.cnbc.com/id/100991730</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Foreign multinationals\nmust pay taxes in India if the effective control of business, management\ndecisions and majority of board meetings take place within the country.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Foreign companies in\nIndia and Indian firms with overseas subsidiaries must pay local taxes based on\nwhere the business is effectively controlled.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PMO made a\nstatement--&nbsp;&nbsp; a small sample analysis of\ndomestic shell companies has found that Rs 1,238 crore in cash have been\ndeposited in these entities in November-December 2016 during the demonitisation\nperiod.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tax department has\nreopened completed assessment in these cases and the ED has initiated action\nunder the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA) 2002. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prevention of Money\nLaundering Act, 2002 is an Act of the Parliament of India enacted to prevent\nmoney-laundering and to provide for confiscation of property derived from\nmoney-laundering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PMLA and the Rules notified there under came\ninto force with effect from July 1, 2005. The Act and Rules notified there\nunder impose obligation on banking companies, financial institutions and\nintermediaries to verify identity of clients, maintain records and furnish\ninformation in prescribed form to Financial Intelligence Unit - India\n(FIU-IND).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The act prescribes that any person found\nguilty of money-laundering shall be punishable with rigorous imprisonment from\nthree years to seven years and where the proceeds of crime involved relate to\nany offence under paragraph 2 of Part A of the Schedule (Offences under the\nNarcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substance Act, 1985), the maximum punishment\nmay extend to 10 years instead of 7 years<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/oQ1X7qc9sSs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/oQ1X7qc9sSs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">OUR\nALICE IN WONDERLAND NAY-- &nbsp;\"<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">LITTLE BO PEEP</b>\" INDIAN GOVT DOES NOT EVEN KNOW WHO IS THE <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">REAL OWNER</span></b> OF AXIS BANK\nWHO OPERATES MORE THAN 13,000 ATMs IN INDIA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Axis_Bank\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Axis_Bank</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qYCth6-8aYA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/qYCth6-8aYA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BIRDIE &nbsp;NUM NUM</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://www.moneycontrol.com/news/business/axis-bk-tiesbanque-privee-edmond-de-rothschild-europe_303854.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.moneycontrol.com/news/business/axis-bk-tiesbanque-privee-edmond-de-rothschild-europe_303854.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aNWm_r45Txs/WLTvgPsCITI/AAAAAAABRRc/G9oCckJT_qoFgGfJxLXI4fB5WfVeJpY1gCLcB/s1600/aliDDDce-14.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"512\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aNWm_r45Txs/WLTvgPsCITI/AAAAAAABRRc/G9oCckJT_qoFgGfJxLXI4fB5WfVeJpY1gCLcB/s640/aliDDDce-14.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell companies in\nPanama and other tax havens advertize their services on their web pages quite\nopenly: it just takes $900 (790 euros) to set up a \"regular Panama\ncorporation\" hiring 'Panama Offshore Worldwide' as a service provider. All\nyou need are the names, addresses and passport copies of three directors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A \"Panama\nFoundation is recommended for asset protection and is especially suitable for\ninheritance cases,\" the website adds. For a fee of $1,300 the client gets\nmaximum anonymity while avoiding a suspicious paper trail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A combined\nfoundation-cum- letter-box company costs you $2,400 and is especially useful\nwhen personal wealth needs to kept separated from operating capital.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panama&nbsp; is filled with dishonest lawyers, dishonest\nbankers, dishonest company formation agents and dishonest companies registered\nthere by those dishonest lawyers so that they can deposit dirty money into\ntheir dishonest banks. The Free Trade Zone is the black hole through which\nPanama has become one of the filthiest money laundering sinks in the world.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panama has over 350,000\nsecretive International Business Companies (IBCs) registered: the third largest\nnumber in the world after Hong Kong and the BVI. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British Virgin\nIslands The British Virgin Islands (BVI), officially the Virgin Islands, is a\nBritish overseas territory located in the Caribbean to the east of Puerto Rico\nits citizens are deemed to be citizens of the EU as well. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stashing money overseas\nisn\u2019t just for criminals. Banks and law firms have entire departments devoted\nto moving wealth offshore. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tiny countries like the\nBritish Virgin Islands (population 30,000) have grown rich by funneling streams\nof cash from one corner of the world to another and siphoning off tiny sums for\nthemselves. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\u2019re the global\neconomy\u2019s ATM. Critics of tax havens call them parasite economies that feed off\nother countries\u2019 tax revenues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WE ASK THE INDIAN GOVT\nTO MAKE A LIST OF RICH INDIANS WHO HAVE BEEN ABROAD FOR LENGTHY HOLIDAYS.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">ALL OF THEM WILL HAVE\nSHELL BANK ACCOUNTS OFFSHORE OR DIRTY MONEY STASHED AWAY</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE ONES TRAVELLING TO\nEUROPE WILL FLY TO AN ADJACENT COUNTRY AND THEN DRIVE DOWN TO SWITZERLAND <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>IT IS SO EASY TO FIND\nOUT IF THERE IS POLITICAL WILL. THESE PEOPLE HAVE BEEN CARELESS<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">EVERY INDIAN EMBASSY (\nEXAMPLE:&nbsp; &nbsp;IN DIRTY MONEY COUNTRIES LIKE SWITZERLAND ) &nbsp;MUST NOW START A NEW DEPT \u2013 TO CATCH DESH\nDROHI INDIANS WITH DIRTY MONEY ..&nbsp; </b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">A close look shows the politicians are in\ncahoots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Indian Finance Minister must come clear\nwhat made him introduced the liberalization process <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hullo my friend Arun \u2013 why is money\nlaundering now a civil offence under</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Foreign Exchange Management Act while\nearlier it was criminal offence<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hullo my friend Arun why does P-notes allow\nthe holders the invest in Indian stock market without revealing their identity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hullo my friend Arun \u2013 what is all this Ad-hoc\nregulations over import and export of gold , which has allowed people to\nsmuggle the same?</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BATAO NAAH<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>PLEAJJE !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Participatory Notes commonly known as P-Notes\nor PNs are instruments issued by registered foreign institutional investors\n(FII) to overseas investors, who wish to invest in the Indian stock markets\nwithout registering themselves with the market regulator, the Securities and\nExchange Board of India - SEBI.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To invest in shares one has to fill up\numpteen forms and provide proof of residence, PAN number, and so on.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But for PN\ninvestors, the system is totally silent, even on basic information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Transferable Participatory Notes (P-Notes) are\nused for money laundering\u2014with govt approval.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>OUR GOVT LOVES LAYERING USING SHELL COMPANIES\n<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>MAJJA AATA HAI !<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">BRRAAAYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Securities and Exchange Board of India ( SEBI\n) , should &nbsp;ensure that the information\nof such beneficial owners is in form of individuals whose KYC information is\nknown while in no case should the KYC information end with name of a company.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sebi needs to examine if this provision of\nallowing transferring of P-Notes is in any way beneficial for easing foreign\ninvestment.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Any investor wanting to invest through P-Notes can always invest\nafresh through Foreign Portfolio Investor (FPI) instead of buying from a P note\nholder<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHAT IS THIS IPL CIRCUS ALL ABOUT?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE KNOW WHO ALL MADE MONEY WHEN IP WAS SHIFTED TO SOUTH AFRICA -- A GAME PLAN INVOLVING PEOPLE IN POWER ( ALL IN GOOD TIME !! )&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CHAMIYA BARS IN MUMBAI ARE A GREAT PLACE TO\nLAUNDER MONEY. &nbsp;&nbsp;TOP POLICE AND MAFIA\nHAVE JOINT OWNERSHIP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MY OFFICERS UNCLE OWNED THE NO1 BAR IN\nMUMBAI.&nbsp; &nbsp;HE HAD SHOWN ME PICTURES OF A ROOM WITH A\nPYRAMID OF CASH .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/l5jJjqJpqro/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/l5jJjqJpqro?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Participatory notes are\nthe financial instruments through which individual foreign investors or hedge\nfunds who do not want to disclose their identity can invest in Indian markets,\notherwise registration with Sebi is a must to get an exposure into Indian\nequities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Registered foreign\ninstitutional investors (FIIs), foreign banks and brokerages based in India\nissue P-notes to foreign investors and invest in Indian stocks on their behalf.\nAny dividends or capital gains collected from the underlying securities go back\nto the investors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While a common investor\nhas to fill up several KYC (know your customer) forms, provide PAN number and\nproof of address, etc, a P-Note investor can invest anonymously. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This makes it a 'legal'\nway to route unaccounted wealth in Indian equities, thus feeding the black\nmoney monster.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAJJA HAI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OUR OWN RULERS ARE\nALLOWING SUCH LOOPHOLES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other than politicians,\nbureaucrats or business-persons, even terror financiers have been &nbsp;misusing the P-Note route to fulfil illegal\nobjectives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a link between\nIndian stock market and international tax havens\u2014 our govt gets CATARACT when\nit comes to this..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sebi MUST make it\nmandatory for the P-Notes holders to adhere to Indian Know your customer (KYC)\nor anti-money laundering (AML) norms.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sebi has now put curbs\non the transfer-ability of P-notes between two foreign investors.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.deccanherald.com/content/598282/sebi-denies-circulation-participatory-notes.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">&nbsp;http://www.deccanherald.com/content/598282/sebi-denies-circulation-participatory-notes.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian black money is\nnot held as hoarded currency cash. &nbsp;A\nhuge percentage &nbsp;is spirited away in\ntax-free havens like Switzerland and Panama and from there it is invested\nthrough mailbox corporations in equity, real estate and bullion across the\nworld. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Elaborate tax frauds\nare committed by corporate giants in squeaky clean cashless financial\nenvironments. In an elaborate charade called transfer pricing, corporations\nwith their army of accountants and lawyers create a maze of shell companies in\ntax havens which have secrecy laws concealing the ownership and the source of\nthe funds. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tax strategy ?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Book the profits in shell companies located\nin tax havens having low or nil rates of tax and show reduced or better still\nzero earnings in countries which have higher rates of tax..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROUND TRIPPING is DELIBERATELY\nallowed for big corporate businesses which bring back their black money through\nbogus shell companies . These funds are invested in the economy as FDI. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>BRAAAYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY\n!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian stock market\nis also rigged using P Notes where Indian black money is parked offshore in a\nshell company from which there is flow back as investment in stock markets,\ncausing share prices to go up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost every Marwari\nbusinessman ( Jain) in Calcutta who are the descendants of Rothschild\u2019s Opium\ndrug running partners operate &nbsp;hundreds\nof SHELL companies <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Paras Mal Lodha has the\nnickname of \u2018Extra Floor Lodha\u2019.&nbsp; This\nRajastani has business interests in both real estate and informal money-lending.\nHe has powerful forces in his payroll.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Dec end 2016, Lodha\nwas arrested at Mumbai Airport while trying to flee to Malaysia, allegedly for\nillegally converting demonetised notes worth Rs. 25 crore into new currency, in\ncollusion with international hawala operators. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration: none;\">September 20, 2015 at 12:55 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_56MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi sr,<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE SAILED WITH A MARWARI RAJASTANI CRYPTO JEW SAILOR FRIENDS-- A VERY GOOD MAN !.<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS FROM A MONEY LENDING FAMILIY.<br />\n<br />\nYOU WILL NOT BELIEVE IF I TELL YOU THE AMOUNT OF WEALTH THEY HAVE-- YET THEY WILL NOT PAY INCOME TAX.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY HAVE SECRET AREAS IN SONAGACHI ( FOUNDED BY THE GRANDFATHER OF TAGORE-- OPIUM DRUG RUNNING PARTER OF ROTHSCHILD AND PIR ALI MUSLIM DWARAKNATH TAGORE ) WHERE THEY HAVE MUJRA LIKE IN BOLLYWOOD MOVIES.<br />\n<br />\nMY FRIEND TOOK ME ALONG-- AND I HAD TO TIE JASMINE AROUND MY RIGHT WRIST.<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A WHOLE DIFFERENT WORLD.<br />\n<br />\nHe use to tell how many lakhs his uncles ( some of them Jains ) gamble away during diwali.<br />\n<br />\nSir Hurkisondas Nurrotumdas was a R stooge.<br />\n<br />\nHis hospital at Girgaum Mumbai built in 1918 was the best in India for the whites .<br />\n<br />\nR Indian stooges like Maharajas , Gandhi etc got free treatment.<br />\n<br />\nHe introduced the Marwari RAIN GAMBLING ( barsaat ka satta ) from Calcutta ( of Opium traders ) to Mumbai.<br />\n<br />\nRain gambling was a monsoon event, when Opium bets ( apin ka satta/ TEJIMUNDI ) were placed on the amount of rain that would fall within a three-hour period ( PAHAR ) .<br />\n<br />\nTo calculate the precise amount of rain that had fallen, a tank ( Kolkotta mori ) was fitted with a spout from which the rainwater would overflow once a certain volume had fallen.<br />\n<br />\nSex with attractive minor Bengali girls , was also a part of this rich Opium wagering traders betting sessions.<br />\n<br />\nTwo Marwari opium betters Biswanath Kshetri and Biseswar Lal Agarwala fell out and it was big news. For turning a blind eye the white invader officers got to taste these BEST Indian girls too ( as there was a legislation in place in Calcutta and Bombay).<br />\n<br />\nSuch dialogues were often \"If Opium agent Marwaris like to go on betting which of two kites will fly the higher, or which of two drops of rain will first fall from the eaves of a house, the British Government cannot stop them.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nSir Sarupchand Hukumchand, was a billionare opium speculator who attended these sessions.<br />\n<br />\nWell well what do you know-<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/opium-drug-running-tagore-family-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Offshore shell companies in Tortola , British Virgin Islands.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Jews know who to crawl through kosher loopholes</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mossack Fonseca helped\nhim set up his investment company Blairmore Holdings (named after his family's\nancestral country estate) in the British Virgin Islands, where, marketing\nmaterial assured investors, the company \"will not be subject to United\nKingdom corporation tax or income tax on its profits.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since these companies\ndon't own much in the way of physical assets, they can be officially located\nanywhere in the world and naturally choose to locate in jurisdictions where\nthey won't need to pay taxes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The BVI has\nharbored&nbsp; more than 9 lakhs&nbsp; offshore SHELL companies (as much as 40\npercent of the world total), with more than 5 lakhs are still active.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is these offshore\nservices providers \u2013 which are thicker on the ground than grocery stores \u2013 that\nunderpin Tortola\u2019s&nbsp; ( largest and most\npopulated BVI island ) prosperity. They pay the state a share of the\ncommissions they charge for setting up and administering offshore firms. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">None of the offshore\ncompanies domiciled with them has an office or employees on the island \u2013 just\none of the roofed-over letterboxes that stretch down to the waterfront, part of\nthe town\u2019s furniture. All it takes to own one is to fill out a form and pay $22\nper month.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tiny countries like the\nBritish Virgin Islands (population 30,000) have grown rich by funneling streams\nof cash from one corner of the world to another and siphoning off tiny sums for\nthemselves.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\u2019re the global economy\u2019s ATM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/QD60o4BYhVo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/QD60o4BYhVo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As any bank card user\nknows, those fees add up. The BVI government collects more than $200 million in\ncorporate fees every year, paying for a $100-million hospital and a massive\npier, capable of docking the largest of the world\u2019s cruise ships.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Critics of tax havens\ncall them parasite economies that feed off other countries\u2019 tax revenues.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I have been to Tortola.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1987, Mossack\nFonseca established its first overseas branch, setting up shop in the British\nVirgin Islands. &nbsp;More than half of the\ncompanies that appear in Mossack Fonseca's files were incorporated in the\nBritish Virgin Islands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Panama, Mossack\nFonseca's home turf, it is a crime for banks to disclose information about\ntheir clients unless they are mandated to do so as part of a criminal\ninvestigation, usually a case involving terrorism or drug trafficking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fonseca served as a top\nadviser to Panamanian President Juan Carlos Varela.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fonseca said his CRIMINAL\nfirm has no responsibility for what its clients do with their offshore shell\ncompanies once they've bought them.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;He reportedly compared the firm to a\n\"car factory,\" and said that blaming Mossack Fonseca for what people\ndo with their companies would be like blaming a carmaker \"if the car was\nused in a robbery.\"\u2014 spoken like a prick of the first order<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If shell companies are\ngetaway cars for bank robbers,then Mossack Fonseca may be the world's shadiest\ncar dealership.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of a\nso-called shell company is that the money put in it can't be traced to its\nowner.&nbsp; If so why are we allowing this in\nIndia. Let white nations do what they want. Are we still slaves to the white\nman ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you want to finance\nterrorism, take a bribe ( or even a bank loan ) , or rob a bank .&nbsp; The shell company is a bogus entity that\nallows you to hold and move cash under a corporate name without international\nlaw enforcement or tax authorities knowing it's yours.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the money is disguised as the assets of\nthis enterprise\u2014which would typically be set up by a trusted lawyer or crony in\nan offshore secrecy haven to further obscure ownership\u2014you can spend it or use\nit for any nefarious purpose.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the very definition of money\nlaundering\u2014taking dirty money and making it clean\u2014and shell companies make it possible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Panama documents\nlink CRIMINALS Mossack Fonseca to an infamous &nbsp;gold heist in England.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before dawn on Nov. 26,\n1983, six robbers slipped into the Brink\u2019s-Mat warehouse at London\u2019s Heathrow\nAirport.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They tied up the security\nguards, doused them with gasoline, and set them on fire while they plundered a\nvault containing nearly 7,000 gold bars, diamonds, and cash.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThanks ever so much for your help. Have a\nnice Christmas,\u201d one of the crooks said as they departed. British media dubbed\nthe heist the \u201cCrime of the Century.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panama Papers show that\nMossack Fonseca's agents were aware that they were managing money connected\nwith this notorious theft.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2013, the BVI\u2019s\nfinancial services commission discovered that the beneficial owner of Pan World\nInvestments, incorporated by the company, was Alaa Mubarak, the son of Egypt\u2019s\nousted president Hosni Mubarak.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two years earlier the\nEU had imposed sanctions on father and son, freezing all their assets. Mubarak\nJr had given an address in London.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://chronikler.com/middle-east/egypt/gamal-mubrak-investment/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://chronikler.com/middle-east/egypt/gamal-mubrak-investment/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike a regular\ncompany, which will have employees, assets and operations, a shell company is a\nhollow structure, set up for the purposes of performing CRIMINAL financial\nmanoeuvres rather than selling goods or services. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those looking to do something dodgy with their\nshell companies prize anonymity above all. The legal frameworks of certain\noffshore centres make ownership devilishly difficult to penetrate..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The strongest secrecy\nis, arguably, to be found onshore, in the United States, in places like\nDelaware ( where Clintons operate 5 shell accounts ) &nbsp;where the agents who incorporate firms aren't\neven required to collect information on the identity of the ultimate\n\"beneficial\" owner (the person to whom the company really belongs, as\nopposed to the registered holder, who can be a nominee or even another\ncompany).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Large corporations\nsometimes use shell companies to hold assets temporarily during complex mergers\nand acquisitions\u2014THIS IS BULLSHIT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These vehicles are also\nused to hide the provenance of offshore money held by those looking to evade\ntaxes owed in their home countries. This can be done by, for instance, placing\nbank accounts in the name of \"legal owners\"\u2014companies, trusts,\nfoundations or combinations of these\u2014rather than natural persons.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Further down\nthe moral scale, shell companies are popular vehicles for moving and concealing\npublic wealth stolen by officials and politicians (or bribes paid to them), as\nwell as for sanctions-busting, drug-trafficking, arms-dealing and the financing\nof terrorism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mossack Fonseca worked\nwith more than 14,000 banks, law firms, company incorporators and other\nmiddlemen to set up companies, foundations and trusts for customers</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mossack Fonseca says\nthese middlemen are its true clients, not the eventual customers who use\noffshore companies. . As for its own procedures, Mossack Fonseca cockily says\nthey often exceed \u201cthe existing rules and standards to which we and others are\nbound.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Donald Trump must know\nthis--&nbsp; Mossack Fonseca used the services\nof a Panama-based firm, Chartered Management Company, run by Gilbert R.J.\nStraub, an American expatriate who played a cameo role in the Watergate scandal.&nbsp; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-M-DBnXiB-zY/WLTjEMqeWYI/AAAAAAABRQ8/tzS2767WeiIdQBYTI1kSaArZ7EGpL6SkQCLcB/s1600/IMG_8872%2Bcopy.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
